items.title: GENTEX AT IAA MOBILITY 2025: MORE COMFORT, LESS GLARE
items.content: MUNICH, September 8, 2025 â€“ At IAA Mobility 2025 (Munich motor show), Gentex Corporation (NASDAQ: GNTX) will showcase automotive features that enhance driving comfort and safety by helping drivers mitigate dangerous roadway glare from sunlight and ultrabright modern headlamps. In addition, the company will highlight technologies from some of its technology partners, including automotive thermal sensing from ADASKY, and wireless power and data transfer from Solace. [...] 2025-09-08 06:00NEWS # GENTEX AT IAA MOBILITY 2025: MORE COMFORT, LESS GLARE [...] Recent studies show that glare from modern headlight technologies remains a major concern of drivers today. Whether from oncoming headlights or rearview mirrors, glare hampers a driverâ€™s forward vision, decreasing reaction time and increasing stopping distances. Gentex interior and exterior automatic-dimming mirrors use cameras, chemistry and algorithmic decision-making to automatically detect and eliminate dangerous rearview mirror glare. items.title: Gentex To Unveil the Next Generation of Its Dimmable Glass, Vision ...
items.content: When it comes to dimmable glass, Gentex is the recognized global leader, shipping over 50 million dimmable devices annually, including anti-glare interior and exterior rearview mirrors for the automotive industry and electronically dimmable windows (EDWs) for the aerospace sector. At CES 2025, Gentex will showcase the next generation of it large-area dimmable devices, including dimmable sunroofs and sun visors. For the first time, Gentex will showcase a new dimmable film technology for large [...] LAS VEGAS, Jan. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- When the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) opens today, Gentex Corporation (NASDAQ: GNTX) is set to debut a host of â€œnext-genâ€ products, including display-integrated dimmable sun visors, digital rearview mirrors with OLED displays, mirror-integrated driver and in-cabin monitoring systems, and enhancements to HomeLink, the industryâ€™s most comprehensive and versatile car-to-home automation system. [...] This year at CES, Gentex will unveil the next generation of HomeLink, which will be compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, operate a broad range of smart home products from leading brands such as Amazon and Samsung Smart Things, and allow users to operate certain Wi-Fi-connected garage doors via smartphone or vehicle-integrated app. For more information, see this separate news release. Partner Technology and Innovation Lab

items.title: Smart Glass Opens a Window to New... | Radiant Vision Systems
items.content: Smart glass is especially attractive to electric vehicle (EV) makers. â€œTests show that SPD-SmartGlass can reduce fuel consumption and increase the driving range of electric vehicles by up to 5.5%, reduce CO2 emissions by 4 grams/km, block 95% of heat, and reduce temperature inside vehicles by up to 18ÂºF/10ÂºC.â€2 Electrochromic glass from Gentex is used in the Boeing 777 to block sunlight and heat, allowing passengers to selectively dim their windows. (Image Â© Gentex) [...] Smart glass is also emerging as a display technology. Unlike traditional displays where a glass screen lies in front of a panel that generates digital images (such as an LCD), some types of smart glass can generate a display image from within the glass layers while preserving transparency. For example, some automakers are working on passenger windows that can be touchscreen infotainment displays, and retailers are investing in store windows that serve as a dynamic marketing panel. With so many [...] Recent decades have seen a proliferation of new glass-based technologies such as touchscreens and ultra-thin flexible glass") for the newest foldable devices. Innovations in â€œsmart glassâ€ fabrication are now taking the material to the next level, as technology advancements and the parallel trends of digitization and displays are helping to create more dynamic glass applications. ## What is Smart Glass?

items.title: Dimmable Glass - Gentex
items.content: Gentex dimmable glass systems utilize electrochromics, which is the science of darkening a material using electricity. They contain a chemical formulation known for their time-tested chemistry and durable device construction. Gentexâ€™s electrochromic technology has the greatest opacity range from light to dark, the highest optical clarity, and allows for the most durable electrochromic devices in the market. items.title: Kognition Announces Partnership with View Inc. to Integrate Smart ...
items.content: Kognition, a leading AI safety and security startup, has announced a new partnership with View Inc. (NASDAQ: VIEW), the market leader in smart glass that automatically adjusts in response to the sun and improves human health and wellness by increasing access to natural light and views of the outdoors, while minimizing heat and glare. Viewâ€™s smart window technology reduces energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions by blocking up to 90% of solar radiation from entering buildings. Every View [...] ### Kognition Announces Partnership with View Inc. to Integrate Smart Building Cloud and Smart Glass Technology MARCH 28, 2023 â€“ Philadelphia, PA [...] View delivers optimal human experiences in buildings. We started by revolutionizing something that hadnâ€™t changed for centuriesâ€”the simple windowâ€”and in so doing, built the only complete, modular, cloud-native platform to deliver on the promise of smart buildings. View Smart Glass and the Smart Building Cloud transform buildings into responsive environments that continuously adjust to meet human needs for natural light, connection to nature, fresh air, and comfortable temperatures while

items.title: Smart Glass: A Bright Future in Technology - BCC Research Blog
items.content: Automotive Industry: Smart glass is increasingly featured in luxury vehicles, enhancing comfort and safety. Dimmed windows and adjustable sunroofs are becoming standard. Example: Tesla vehicles incorporate smart glass for sunroofs, elevating the driving experience. Healthcare: Hospitals use smart glass for privacy and hygiene. Glass walls in operating rooms and patient wards switch between transparent and opaque to ensure privacy. [...] ## The Booming Smart Glass Market According to BCC Research, The global smart glass market is growing, projected to expand from $6.2 billion in 2024 to $10.8 billion by 2029, at an impressive CAGR of 11.7%. This growth is driven by increasing demand for energy-efficient solutions and innovative technologies across multiple sectors. ### Global Markets and Technologies for Smart Glass [...] The global market for smart glass is expected to grow from $6.2 billion in 2024 to reach $10.8 billion by the end of 2029, at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 11.7% from 2024 through 2029. Download Your Complimentary Report ## Key Market Drivers: Energy Efficiency Requirements: Rising energy costs and stringent environmental regulations have made smart glass a preferred choice for green buildings and vehicles.

items.title: View Inc. Reaches $11M Settlement in Securities Class Action
items.content: USGlass Magazine & USGNN News The Info Source of record for architectural glass leaders. # View Inc. Reaches $11M Settlement in Securities Class Action Joshua HuffLeave a comment View Inc. reached an $11 million settlement with investors following a multi-year class action lawsuit that accused the smart glass manufacturer of federal securities law violations after the companyâ€™s move to go public in 2021. [...] Court documents stated that on Aug. 16, 2021, View announced it had begun an independent investigation concerning the â€œadequacy of the companyâ€™s previously disclosed warranty accrual.â€ Due to this news, Viewâ€™s share price fell $1.26, or over 24%, to close at $3.92 per share on Aug. 17, 2021, on unusually heavy trading volume. [...] Prior to the settlement, Stadium Capital officials argued that View made material misrepresentations to investors in, among other filings with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, its Dec. 23, 2020, de-special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) registration statement. The statement included two amendments concerning a materially misstated and understated warranty accrual related to Viewâ€™s â€œsmart panels.â€

items.title: 5 Innovations in Glass & Glazing Technology - Dynamic Fenestration
items.content: (PDLC). Continued innovations in Smart Glass technology are expected to improve performance, increase sizes and reduce costs, making it more accessible to a broader market. Smart Glass can be used in windows, doors and skylights as well as interior partitions. Maximum size limitations remain the primary obstacle for many projects. [...] Smart Glass, also known as switchable glass, is a type of glass that can change its light transmission properties when an electric current or other stimulus is applied. This technology is expected to become more advanced and widely used in the next 5 years, as it offers significant benefits for energy efficiency, privacy, aesthetics and comfort. There are currently three primary types of Smart Glass â€“ 1) electrochromic 2) Suspended Particle Device (SPD) and 3) Polymer Dispersed Liquid crystal

items.title: Tech giants bet consumers are finally ready to strap on smart glasses
items.content: The latest entrant is from Alibaba, which on Thursday started selling smart glasses that let wearers access the Chinese online retailer's Qwen AI app with the touch of a button. Consumers can use the device, dubbed Quark AI Glasses, to search the internet, automatically compile meeting notes, make payments, listen to music and manage their schedule, among other functions. [...] View CBS News In CBS News App Open Chrome Safari Continue [...] In the U.S., Meta this summer teamed with eyewear maker Oakley to introduce AI glasses that lets users make calls, send and receive text messages, listen to music, stream video, translate foreign languages, and generally tap the internet via the company's AI app. Geared to athletes, the product starts at $399. Meta also offers AI glasses in a partnership with Ray-Ban.

items.title: Alibaba Unveils AI Smart Glasses: S1 Model Starts at $537 - YouTube
items.content: ### Description 14446 views Posted: 27 Nov 2025 Alibaba began sales of its first smart glasses powered by its Qwen AI models, marking a rare foray into consumer hardware. The new Quark S1 glasses, which start at 3,799 yuan ($537), include built-in translucent displays that superimpose contextual information on the userâ€™s view of surroundings. Bloomberg Intelligence's Matthew Bloxham has more.

items.title: Smart glasses: no longer stuck in the past, but looking at a future ...
items.content: million pairs of these smart glasses since their debut. In part motivated by the traction that Metaâ€™s smart glasses were getting with consumers, several other firms have also launched their own versions including names such as Brilliant Labs, Even Realities and Halliday. Further, Apple is reportedly working on its own smart glasses possibly for a 2026 release, and Google at its I/O earlier this year announced that it will be resurrecting its Google Glass in partnership with Warby Parker for [...] As Google lost love for its Google Glass, Meta, which had entered this product category around a year earlier (with Ray-Ban Stories) as part of its long-standing extended reality ambitions, was pressing ahead launching in Q3 2023 its latest iteration of smart glasses, the Ray-Ban Meta. Looking stylish, light weight, priced right and integrated with Metaâ€™s popular social media apps these smart glasses turned out to be a breakout hit. According to the latest figures from Meta it has sold 2 [...] The report considers four major developments in the last six months: innovation expanding beyond smartphones to wearables and the smart home; smart glasses seeing a revival; chipmakers intensifying efforts with generative AI; and direct-to-device strategies increasingly becoming a regional play. From these, the one device innovation that I am particularly excited about is the resurgence of smart glasses. Smart glasses were once seen as dorky and uncool

items.title: Alibaba's AI glasses to rival Meta go on sale for $500 - CNBC
items.content: Alibaba announced plans to release a pair of smart glasses powered by its AI models. The Quark AI Glasses are Alibaba's first foray into the smart glasses product category. Alibaba Alibaba's artificial intelligence-powered smart glasses went on sale on Thursday as the Chinese tech giant looks to ramp up its focus on consumer AI in an increasingly competitive market. [...] The smart glasses market is still small but growing rapidly. By 2026, shipments of AI glasses are expected to exceed more than 10 million units, doubling from 2025, according to a forecast from Omdia. [...] In September, Meta unveiled the $799 Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses, the social media company's first consumer-ready smart glasses with a built-in display. Users can control the device via hand gestures with a special wristband. Alibaba's glasses will initially go on sale in China and compete with domestic rivals, including consumer electronics maker Xiaomi and startup Xreal.

items.title: Meta's smartglasses are a specialty gadget this holiday | Reuters
items.content: U.S. smartglasses sales tripled year-over-year in 2025, according to market research firm Circana - great news for a type of gadget that crashed and burned after Google's ill-fated 'glass' experiment in 2013, and which has been trying to regain respect ever since. [...] [1/3]A visitor reviews the new Meta smart glasses during the Meta annual Connect conference at the company's headquarters in Menlo Park, California, U.S., September 16, 2025. REUTERS/Carlos Barria/File Photo Purchase Licensing Rights, opens new tab "Long term, who knows? Weâ€™ll all be cyborgs." [...] Holiday sales this season will likely dwarf the $52.6 million U.S. shoppers spent on smart glasses in the final quarter of 2024, said Ben Arnold, a consumer technology industry analyst with Circana. Analysts expect tech companies like Apple and Samsung to release their own smartglass products soon.

items.title: SageGlass RealTone: As clear as electrochromic glass can get
items.content: SageGlass pioneered electrochromic glass technology and their newest smart glass, RealTone, was developed to solve a long-standing challenge in the dynamic glass market: delivering both performance and style. According to Jordan Doria, Global Marketing Director at SageGlass, RealTone represents a breakthrough in electrochromic glass. As the glass tints, it preserves true-to-life colours while minimising excess glare, allowing seamless integration of design, energy efficiency and occupant [...] Home GW News Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners # SageGlass RealTone: As clear as electrochromic glass can get SageGlass launches RealTone, the most neutral electrochromic glass solution available. Developed recently, RealTone eliminates the "blue hue" commonly associated with electrochromic glass, delivering a neutral aesthetic while still performing as expected. Here are the details. [...] #### Tags ### No time? No problem with the GW-NEWS newsletter With our newsletter, you will regularly receive selected information and news from us, bundled and free of charge directly to your mailbox.

items.title: Smart Glass Market Set to Reach USD 13.83 Billion by 2032 Driven ...
items.content: North America dominated the Smart Glass Market in 2023, holding a 35% market share, driven by robust infrastructure and regulations promoting energy efficiency. Companies like Glaston Corporation and SAGE Electrochromics are leading innovations in electrochromic and photovoltaic glass technologies. The demand for smart buildings, automotive applications, and consumer electronics is growing, with a strong focus on sustainability and energy-efficient solutions. Meanwhile, the Asia-Pacific region [...] Saint-Gobain (SageGlass, Priva-lite) View Inc. (View Smart Glass, Dynamic Glass) Gentex Corporation (Automotive Electrochromic Mirrors, Home/Office Smart Glass) AGC Inc. (WONDERLITE, Halio) Research Frontiers Inc. (SPD-SmartGlass, SPD-Smart Windows) Asahi Glass Co. Ltd. (LUMIFLON, SunGuard) Corning Inc. (Gorilla Glass, Electrochromic Glass) Schott AG (Smart Touch Display, Conturan Glass) Polytronix, Inc. (Polyvision Privacy Glass, Switchable Glass) [...] Purchase Single User PDF of Smart Glass MarketReport (33% Discount) @ Recent Development Jan 07, 2025: Gentex Corporation unveiled next-generation dimmable glass technology at CES 2025, featuring film-based electrochromic sunroofs and innovative dimmable sun visors with integrated displays for driver alerts. 17 Sep 2024: Morphotonics secured USD 10M in Series B funding with backing from 3M to advance its large-area nanoimprint technology for augmented reality (AR) lenses and 3D displays.

items.title: Lessons Learned from Smart Glass 1.0 - NEXT Energy Technologies
items.content: The failures of View and Halio symbolically mark an end to what Iâ€™m calling Smart Glass 1.0, which represents the first major push to commercialize electrochromic technology. This effort was led by three companies - Sage (originally Sun Active Glass Electrochromics), View, Inc. (originally Soladigm), and HALIO, Inc. (originally Kinestral). [...] Collectively, these 3 companies raised a staggering $3 billion dollars over the course of 15 years, and yet in their peak production never collectively produced more than .05% of the annual volume in commercial glass. And now 2 of them are defunct or out of business, and it is an open industry â€œsecretâ€ that if Sage was not funded by a large multi-billion dollar conglomerate, they would have ceased operations a while ago. [...] The promise of smart glass was - and still is - tremendous. It promises the best of both worlds â€“ optimally tinted windows when the sun is on the building to block glare and heat gain from UV and IR, and clear glass when the sun is behind a cloud or has moved to another part of the building. This solution promised to maximize energy efficiency and occupant comfort dynamically throughout the day, delivering unprecedented performance with an unmatched occupant experience.

items.title: Smart Glass Market Leaders: Top 28 Companies Evaluated in
items.content: August 18, 2025 04:16 ET| Source: Research and MarketsFollow Research and Markets Share Dublin, Aug. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Smart Glass - Company Evaluation Report, 2025" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. [...] Saint-Gobain is a major contender in light and sustainable construction, offering a wide range of products, including smart glass under the Sage Glass brand. The company emphasizes sustainable solutions and operates across various regions, including the Americas, Europe, and Asia. With its extensive product portfolio and research capabilities, Saint-Gobain maintains a competitive market share by leveraging its geographic reach and continuous innovation. AGC Inc. [...] Smart glass, also referred to as switchable or dynamic glass, is a cutting-edge glazing technology capable of altering its light transmission properties in response to external stimuli such as electric current, heat, or light. This functionality allows the glass to transition between transparent, translucent, or opaque states, enabling enhanced control over privacy, lighting, and temperature. Smart glass is widely utilized in applications including energy-efficient buildings, automotive

items.title: Smart Glass Is Better Than Dumb Glass, So Why Isn't It In ...
items.content: By dynamically adjusting its tint, smart glass promises to cut glare, save energy, and improve comfort without the need for blinds or shades.

items.title: Enhance Architectural Innovation: Dynamic Smart Glass | Smartglass
items.content: Smartglass International, a leading supplier and integrator of switchable glass solutions, is thrilled to announce a strategic partnership with ChromoGenics, a prominent proptech company specialising in dynamic smart glass. This collaboration aims to enhance the manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of revolutionary ConverLightÂ® Dynamic glass in the European and North American markets. [...] As part of this strategic collaboration, the partnership will harness ChromoGenicsâ€™ expertise in developing innovative dynamic smart glass solutions. ChromoGenicsâ€™ ConverLight Dynamic technology is at the forefront of industry innovation, providing advanced solar control and energy-saving capabilities. By combining this ground-breaking technology with Smartglass Internationalâ€™s manufacturing capabilities, customers will have access to a wide range of high-performance switchable glass solutions [...] #### Home / Resources / News / ... # Enhancing Architectural Innovations: Smartglass International Teams up with ChromoGenics to Expand Dynamic Glass Offerings woman stands at a window looking at the skyline. Dynamic glass solutions allow for easy variation in glass states, offering a unique look and feel to your architectural project

items.title: ChromoGenics enters cooperation with Smartglass International
items.content: Chromogenics Chromogenics Swedish Swedish English English # ChromoGenics enters cooperation with Smartglass International October 27, 2023 [...] ChromoGenics and Smartglass International of Ireland have signed a letter of intent regarding manufacturing, marketing and distribution of the dynamic glass ConverLightÂ® Dynamic. Smartglass is a highly respected supplier & integrator of switchable glass solutions serving the European and North American markets with a proven track record of 4000+ projects across 35 countries world-wide. [...] The companyâ€™s production facilities in Uppsala have been financed in part by a conditional loan from the Swedish Energy Agency. ChromoGenicsâ€™ share (CHRO) is listed on Nasdaq First North Growth Market, and Vator is the Certified Adviser. 2023-10-27 ChromoGenics enters cooperation with Smartglass International to our press releases Co-financed by Swedish Energy Agency logo in PNGSwedish Energy Agency logo in PNG

items.title: ChromoGenics will deliver Dynamic Glass to a project in Sweden
items.content: Reuters Reuters # ChromoGenics will deliver Dynamic Glass to a project in Sweden ChromoGenics will deliver ConverLight dynamic glass to a project in Sweden during the first half of 2024. Expected total order value is 5 MSEK. [...] ChromoGenics is a proptech company that produces smart dynamic glass, improving indoor environments and well-being while reducing energy consumption, operational costs, and climate impact in properties. The product, ConverLightÂ® Dynamic, is based on unique patented technology from the Ã…ngstrÃ¶m Laboratory in Uppsala, where electrochromic coatings are laminated into plastic film. The result is a dynamic film that can be laminated into glass, providing effective sun protection in buildings and [...] ChromoGenics' production facility in Uppsala has been partly financed through conditional loans from the Swedish Energy Agency. ChromoGenics' stock (CHRO) is listed on the Nasdaq First North Growth Market, with Vator Securities serving as the Certified Adviser. 2023-10-15 ChromoGenics delivers Dynamic Glass to a project in Sweden ## Compare charts ## Latest news ## More news from Reuters

items.title: Switchable facade glass in any shape - GW News
items.content: Home GW News Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners Our partners # Switchable facade glass in any shape ConverLight from ChromoGenics opens up a new dimension of design freedom. The electrochromic glass combines energy efficiency with maximum flexibility in shape and design â€“ from curved lines to unusual geometric structures. Find out how it works here. [...] ConverLight glass is manufactured as laminated safety glass (LSG) with the switchable ChromoGenics film and can be used directly in facades or combined in insulating glass with a double or triple structure. The electrochromic glass can be seamlessly integrated into smart home systems or controlled manually. The ability to produce glass in almost any shape while offering variable sun protection opens up completely new creative possibilities for architects and planners. www.converlight.com [...] ## Why is ConverLight a special product? Johan Mohamed Dirfors Electrochromic glass, which changes its light and heat transmission through electrical control, is not a completely new technology. However, ChromoGenics has made a decisive advance with ConverLight.

items.title: Farmers gain precision edge with AI smart glasses - Xinhua
items.content: These smart farming glasses are currently under development by researchers from the artificial intelligence (AI) research center at China Agricultural University (CAU). By combining computer vision, deep learning, the Internet of Things and augmented reality, these glasses aim to tackle some of agriculture's toughest challenges, from labor shortages and inconsistent fieldwork to the battle against pests and diseases. [...] Farmers gain precision edge with AI smart glasses-Xinhua # Farmers gain precision edge with AI smart glasses Source: Xinhua Editor: huaxia 2025-06-27 23:10:15 BEIJING, June 27 (Xinhua) -- At first glance, they look like ordinary glasses until they are worn, when cutting-edge agricultural expertise brings the field to life. These high-tech lenses can scan crops for disease, track fruit growth in real time, and even deliver step-by-step farming instructions directly to the wearer. [...] During its technical tests in a grape farm in southwest China's Yunnan Province, the technology has cut pruning errors from 10 percent to less than 2 percent, saving farmers significant losses. "Right now, we're focusing on high-value crops such as grapes, strawberries and tomatoes," Li said. "Not all produce suits this method. We target technically demanding cash crops, including citrus, blueberries, apples and pears."

items.title: Enhancing greenhouse efficiency using smart glass films
items.content: In a career spanning decades, continents and planets, Distinguished Professor David Tissue has maintained a thirst for exploration and a desire to help crops thrive, even in the most hostile environments. News ### Smart Glass and LLEAF: novel spectra-shifting tech to boost energy-efficiency, crop growth and yield under cover A new CRC project is comparing two novel light-spectra-shifting films on energy-efficiency and crop productivity in greenhouse-grown lettuce. [...] Hear Dist. Prof. Tissue talk about the ongoing trials of new retrofit films that aim to reduce heat and boost growth and yield in glasshouse-grown crops, involving Western Sydney University scientists, Hort Innovation, various industry partners and FFS. News ### Smart glass-LLEAF project wrap-up: key findings and next steps [...] In the recently completed 'Smart Glass' project, scientists at Western Sydney University showed the energy-saving ability of SG ULR-80 and the yield-increasing potential of LLEAF. Next steps? To combine the strengths of both. News ### CRC indoor-cropping projects feature on ABC Landline

items.title: JINHE debuts AR GLASSES for smart agriculture : r/augmentedreality
items.content: Product Overview The agricultural smart AR glasses introduced by Jinhe Tech are a mobile intelligent monitoring and investigation tool that aids in the development of digital agriculture. [...] Recently at an agriculture conference in China, Jinhe Tech showcased their independently developed Jinhe AR Glasses. In the open-air demonstration area, the live operation of the Jinhe Smart AR Glasses undoubtedly became the center of attention. This tool, equipped with intelligent recognition and real-time information transmission functions, operated stably and efficiently even under the intense sun. A technician, wearing the glasses, walked through a simulated field. The built-in recognition [...] To allow more people to learn about Jinhe Tech's products and technology, the team launched a live online broadcast of the smart AR glasses demonstration from the event site. A technician introduced in the live stream: "This device currently supports the surveying and investigation of 20 types of national first and second-category pests and diseases. It can visually identify rice planthoppers, rice leaf rollers, wheat aphids, wheat head blight, wheat stripe rust, rapeseed aphids, southern corn

items.title: Smart Glasses Revolutionize Farming with Real-Time AI Assistance
items.content: They may look like regular eyewear, but once powered on, these smart glasses transform the way farmers interact with their fields. Developed by researchers at China Agricultural Universityâ€™s AI Research Center, these next-gen smart glasses bring cutting-edge agricultural intelligence straight to a farmerâ€™s line of sight. Equipped with advanced sensors and AI models, the glasses can detect crop diseases, track fruit growth, and provide real-time farming instructions right in the field [...] Currently focused on high-value crops like grapes, strawberries, and tomatoes, the glasses are being adapted for others such as apples, citrus, and blueberries. To make the device field-ready, the team compressed large AI models and implemented quantum neural networks, enabling offline use in remote areas without strong internet access. â€œThis isnâ€™t just about the glassesâ€”itâ€™s about building a complete smart farming ecosystem,â€ Li said. â€œFrom data collection to intelligent analysis and precise [...] ## A Smarter Way to Farm â€œOur goal is to make AI as essential to farming as seeds or fertilizer,â€ Li said. â€œWeâ€™re not just detecting problemsâ€”weâ€™re enabling real-time decisions and automated solutions.â€ These smart glasses are more than a tool. Theyâ€™re a glimpse into the future of farmingâ€”connected, intelligent, and efficient. ## SMART GLASSES ON Your go-to website for the latest news, buying guides, reviews and insights into the innovative world of digital eyewear ## Quick Links

items.title: Iristick News â€“ Press Releases & Industry Updates
items.content: Four Ways Agri-Food Professionals Can Benefit from Smart Glasses Global food production system is facing tremendous challenges. Agricultural productivity needs to increase significantly to feed a growing global population, while its environmental footprint must decrease to help mitigate climate change. In addition, millions of farmers worldwide, work long hours to provide us with nutritious food and operate in tough socio-economic environments. Hence the productivity and environmental [...] costs. For Capestone an important reason to further strengthen the distribution and footprint of Iristick in Europe by this complementary offering to the current smart glass portfolio. 19 april 2022 [...] # News Iristick announces major capital increase enabling accelerated user adoption Iristickâ€™s smart glasses are being used by professionals across industries in Europe and the US since the company was founded in 2015. Various large-scale proof-of-concept projects are underway, which are expected to lead to accelerated adoption of smart glasses in 2023-2024. 22 February 2023

items.title: Rokid Unveils World's Lightest AI-AR Smart Glasses
items.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies . More info . X close Home/ News ## Smart Glasses Innovation Accelerates as AI, AR, and Lightweight Designs Reshape the Market September 3, 2025 Rokid introduces ultra-light AI-AR smart glasses with translation, AR overlays, and AI toolsâ€”tapping into a market set to hit $4.1B by 2030. [...] The bigger picture is clear. Smart glasses are moving from curiosity to necessity. The technology is maturing, the market is expanding, and products like Rokidâ€™s are proving the potential. People are ready to wear their computers instead of holding them. That changes the way we work, communicate, and interact with the world. [...] The timing couldnâ€™t be better. According to MarketsandMarkets, the global smart glasses market is on the rise, projected to grow from $1,223.7 million in 2025 to $4129.3 million by 2030. Asia-Pacific is leading the charge, driven by its manufacturing strength and strong demand across industrial and healthcare applications. At the same time, AR, mixed reality, advanced sensors, and high-speed networks are unlocking new possibilities for both consumers and enterprises.

items.title: Smart glasses for industry | The top 3 in comparison - Bitnamic
items.content: Development partnerInterfaces & HostingSmartglasses & Augmented Reality BlogResource centerEvents About usPartnerContact & RouteBook demoCareer Bitnamic GmbH06-May-2025 13:04:088 min read # Smart glasses for industry | The top 3 in comparison Previous Next Smart glasses for industry | The top 3 in comparison 11:27 # Smart Glasses for industry | # The top 3 in comparison [...] ## Data glasses for industry and remote maintenance for more efficient work processes Remote maintenance in combination with smart glasses is the next step towards Industry 4.0. It ensures shorter production downtimes, lower costs and a better carbon footprint, as time-consuming travel can be avoided. Especially in these challenging times, more and more companies are increasingly focusing on the digitalization of their work processes. [...] The M400 is also drop-proof, dust-proof and protected against temporary immersion in water with an IP rating of 67. It is somewhat more fragile than the Navigator 520, but is also designed for wet, dusty environments. Due to their (structural) properties, both data glasses models are increasingly being used on construction sites, in production, logistics and in the oil, gas and automotive industries.

items.title: Meta Smart Glasses Sell Out in Two Days: What's Behind the Craze?
items.content: The success of Metaâ€™s smart glasses reflects a broader boom in the global smart eyewear market. According to IDC, global shipments of smart glasses reached 1.49 million units in Q1 2025 â€” up 82.3% year-over-year. China contributed 494,000 units, a 116.1% increase compared to last year. Competition is heating up fast: in 2025 alone, 36 manufacturers released over 50 AI-powered glasses worldwide. [...] Globally, Meta and Ray-Ban have sold over 2 million smart glasses since their first collaboration in 2023. According to Metaâ€™s Q2 2025 earnings call, year-over-year sales of Ray-Ban smart glasses grew by over 300% â€” a clear sign that wearables are entering the mainstream. ### 2. Product Design: Where Fashion Meets Function [...] > â€œMeta Ray-Ban Display smart glasses are off to a strong start! Weâ€™re now sold out in nearly all stores nationwide, and our November trial appointments are almost fully booked,â€ said Meta CTO Andrew Bosworth on Threads. Currently priced at $800, the smart glasses and their companion sEMG wristband are available exclusively in the U.S. through select Best Buy, LensCrafters, Ray-Ban stores, and Meta Labs in major cities. ### 1. Record-Breaking Sales: A Rare Phenomenon in Consumer Tech

items.title: When Meta's AR Glasses Finally Go Mainstream (and Why Your ...
items.content: Meta's timing isn't accidental. Global smart glasses shipments surged 210% in 2024, largely driven by Ray-Ban Meta's success. The company captured over 60% market share in a category that finally crossed the 2 million unit milestone. [...] Instead, Meta's plotting a more strategic path with "Hypernova"â€”smart glasses with a screen launching by late 2025. These will bridge the gap between today's camera-only Ray-Bans and tomorrow's full AR experience. Priced between $1,000-$1,400, Hypernova features a monocular display in the lower-right quadrant of the right lens, gesture controls via capacitive touch on the temples, and camera quality matching the iPhone 13. [...] Augmented Reality Newsnews ### Intel Reveals Vaunt Smartglasses, Normal Looking Glasses That Work with iOS & Android Smartphones Augmented Reality Newsnews ### Why Your Robot's Next Teacher Might Be Wearing Smart Glasses Augmented Reality Newsnews ### When Your Glasses Start Thinking (and You Can't Turn Them Off) Augmented Reality Newsnews ### When Meta's AR Glasses Finally Go Mainstream (and Why Your Wallet Better Be Ready)

items.title: We tried smart glasses to see if they're worth the hype - YouTube
items.content: working on their own smart glasses as well. So, you have a lot of the major companies that are in the consumer tech space. And then there are smaller players as well that were kind of like in the mixed reality and virtual reality space that are now saying like hey we have this type of technology that we've been working on. We can also jump on the smart glasses trend. I'm curious from a consumer perspective. I mean obviously smart glasses are still niche. This is still a fairly [...] smart glasses, this is a lot of wearable devices. You'll have some level of computing that happens on the device itself and then you'll have some things that rely on the phone. And in Meta's case, I know they have a dedicated app for managing the glasses and controlling settings and things like that and pairing them. So, um, this really is kind of like an extension of your phone is how a lot of these companies are pitching it, right? From your experience trying these devices, [...] they kind of are in the process. It feels like almost every major tech company is is trying to do this now. Um, we have Samsung and Google that are partnering on a pair of smart glasses based on the new operating system that they worked together on. It's called Android XR. Snap is also working on a pair of more sophisticated glasses that that we actually got to try a while ago. Um, that'll be coming out sometime next year. And then there are rumors and reports about Apple

items.title: Alibaba to launch AI-powered glasses creating a Chinese rival to Meta
items.content: The Quark AI Glasses are Alibaba's answer to Meta's smart glasses that were designed in collaboration with Ray-Ban. The Chinese tech giant will also now compete with Chinese consumer electronics player Xiaomi who this year released its own AI glasses. Why Meta and Snap think AR glasses will be the future of computing Alibaba said its glasses will support hands-free calling, music streaming, real-time language translation, and meeting transcription. The glasses also feature a built-in camera. [...] CNBC Join IC Join Pro Join IC Join Pro # Alibaba to launch AI-powered glasses creating a Chinese rival to Meta thumbnail In this article Alibaba on Monday unveiled a pair of smart glasses powered by its artificial intelligence models, marking the Chinese firm's first foray into the product category. items.title: News - Smart Glass Technologies
items.content: At Smart Glass Technologies, we empower architects, designers, developers, and homeowners to maximize the use of glass and natural light in their projects, while simultaneously providing innovative solutions for privacy with our switchable smart glass. We are ready to respond to the ambition and imagination of our customers. We manufacture high-quality products and provide an exceptional customer service experience. Get Started About SGT Story & Vision Certifications Completed Projects [...] Smart Glass Technologies, a leading provider of innovative glass solutions, is proud to announce its sponsorship of the amateur soccer team FC Dallas Dynamo. items.title: 5 Smart Glass Startups with High Growth Potential in 2025 - GreyB
items.content: Founded in 2010, rather than developing a smart glass, OrCam focused on manufacturing a product called OrCam MyEye, which can make any glass a smart glass. OrCam MyEye is a revolutionary voice-activated device that attaches to virtually any glasses. It can instantly read text from a book, smartphone screen, or any other surface, recognize faces, help you shop on your own, work more efficiently, and live a more independent life. The second version of the product i.e. OrCam MyEye 2 was named in [...] These were just a few exemplary companies that performed well in our parameters, out of more than 70 innovative startups in the smart glasses domain. [...] The last few years have also witnessed increased investment in manufacturers and start-ups working in the smart glass domain with a number of high-profile acquisitions and direct investments by large companies. For instance, North acquired 100+ patents from Intel in 2016, and in June 2020, Google acquired North.

items.title: China Automotive Smart Glass Research Report, 2023
items.content: At present, smart dimming glass is often applied to panoramic canopies, not only giving a deeper spatial impression but also automatically reducing the transmittance of ultraviolet and infrared rays in the blazing sun for the purpose of lowering the temperature inside. According to the data from ResearchInChina, 1,636,900 units of new passenger cars in China were installed with panoramic canopies in 2022, 0.5% of which were smart dimming canopies. It is expected that panoramic canopies will be [...] installed in 3,684,100 units of new passenger cars in 2025, 6.1% of which will be smart dimming canopies. [...] 1 Overview of Automotive Smart Glass 1.1 Overview of Automotive Glass 1.2 Overview of Automotive Smart Dimming Glass 1.2.1 Classification of Automotive Smart Dimming Glass Technology 1.2.2 Application of Automotive Smart Dimming Glass 1.2.3 Functions of Automotive Smart Dimming Glass 1.2.4 Automotive Smart Dimming Glass Process in China 1.3 Automotive Glass Antenna 1.3.1 Automotive 5G Glass Antenna 2 Automotive Smart Glass Industry Chain 2.1 Automotive Glass Industry Chain

items.content: rumours that future versions could include health monitoring features like heart rate tracking or stress detection, taking your glasses from smart to superhuman. One thing is certain: Baidu is onto something huge here. These glasses are setting a new standard for what wearable technology can do. They blend convenience, AI, and sleek design in a way that no one expected. Keep an eye out; this is just the beginning. AI-Powered Functionalities [...] right in your line of sight. Travellers and tourists could effortlessly communicate in foreign countries, with real-time translation appearing before their eyes. Professionals in various fields, such as construction, logistics, and even healthcare, were shown how these glasses could help make their work more efficient. Whether it is displaying hands-free notes in a meeting or helping a doctor track patient data on the go, Xiaodu's possibilities seem endless. [...] Xiaodu's voice assistant will respond to your commands almost as if it is reading your mind. Next, there is the real-time translation feature, which could very well be the highlight of these smart glasses. It is like having a personal interpreter right on your face. Whether you are travelling abroad or dealing with international clients, the glasses can translate speech in real-time, displaying it on your screen. This means no

items.title: AI innovation powers China's lead in smart eyewear
items.content: Leading Chinese tech companies are racing to make smart glasses the next mass-market device after smartphones. Baidu recently launched its AI-powered glasses Xiaodu Pro, which weighs just 39 grams and integrates a multimodal large model, supporting an array of AI functions, including translation, object recognition, photography, recording and conference memo. [...] Continuous breakthroughs in multimodal AI perception and semantic understanding technologies, coupled with customized AI services based on massive data from user behaviors, will accelerate the development of the smart glasses industry and the integration of such devices into people's daily lives, she said. Ye estimated that Chinese smart glasses shipments will exceed 4.9 million units next year, driven by technological advancements, improved user experience and decline in prices. [...] As artificial intelligence is rapidly evolving and spearheading an industrial revolution, Chinese tech heavyweights are doubling down on the burgeoning smart glasses sector, which experts said is expected to become a key gateway for next-generation human-machine interaction and inject new vitality into the global consumer electronics market.

items.title: SmartGlass
items.content: Contact UsEmail Alerts Contact # The world's best-selling smart glass. SPD-SmartGlass technology by Research Frontiers is available in products worldwide through our global supply chain of licensed partners. Block 99.5% of light in 1 second The only electronically dimmable glass that lets you control the level of tint to your glass & block heat full-time THOUSANDS OF CUSTOMERS ARE ALREADY controlling light through glass at the touch of a button. industries [...] Control your electronically dimmable glass from fully clear to extremely dark, and to any level of tint in between. Enjoy the views without squinting at the sun. Blocks heat even when your glass is clear SPD-SmartGlass blocks 95% of heat in its tinted state. But it also significantly blocks heat in its clear state. Improve the energy efficiency of your space by installing Retrofit your existing windows with SPD-SmartGlass [...] How do I control SPD-SmartGlass products? SPD-SmartGlass products can be controlled via simple switches (similar to dimmers), push buttons, motion detection, smart device apps or home automation systems. letâ€™s get in touch Have any more questions? Send an inquiry and weâ€™ll reach out with more answers. items.title: QS Quacquarelli Symonds: Global Higher Education Experts
items.content: About usLife at QS Meet the teamQS One Future17 Newsroom Reach out to one of our trusted QS spokespeople or explore our latest insights and announcements. Explore our Careers More Our solutionsNewsroomStudents Partner with us Partner with us # Universities are shaping ASEAN's future ## Skills development, sustainability excellence and research prowess make ASEAN higher education shine. Read now The world of work is changing. Get the insight [...] ### Better decisions. Better outcomes. Every day. For over 30 years, weâ€™ve helped institutions, governments, and employers drive meaningful change in higher education. Explore how we can help. #1 We are the global market leader for student insights and guidance (Google Trends 2024). 8,000 Over 8,000 universities are assessed for the QS World University Rankings. 100,000 We support 100,000 students to enrol at our partner universities every year. 800+ [...] We are proud that QS has more than 800+ staff in 40 countries. ## What our partners think ## Careers at QS Launched as a student project in 1990 by our founder and President Nunzio Quacquarelli, QS has grown to become the established world leader in higher education performance and insights. We are always looking for new talent to join us. See vacancies

items.title: Essilorluxottica to boost production capacity for smart glasses
items.content: EssilorLuxottica and Meta have been collaborating since 2019, creating two generations of Ray-Ban branded smart glasses, and last year agreed a new long-term deal that will take both companies "into the next decade". Learn about the latest breakthroughs in AI and tech with the Reuters Artificial Intelligencer newsletter. here. Advertisement Â· Scroll to continue [...] Skip to main content # Essilorluxottica to boost production capacity for smart glasses By Reuters Companies EssilorLuxottica SA Meta Platforms Inc MILAN, Feb 13 (Reuters) - Eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica (ESLX.PA), opens new tab plans to boost its production capacity for smart glasses and hopes to expand its collaboration with Meta (META.O), opens new tab to other brands, Chief Executive Francesco Milleri said late on Wednesday. [...] Milleri said the company was expanding its production capacity for Ray-Ban Meta, set to reach 10 million annual units by the end of next year. This could also be used for other smart glasses and Nuance Audio glasses, which invisibly integrate an open-ear hearing solution. Deputy CEO Paul du Sallant said the additional production would be in China and other plants in Southeast Asia. Reporting by Elisa Anzolin Editing by Christina Fincher

items.title: Google AI Glasses Development Complete, Taiwan Manufacturers ...
items.content: These advancements have introduced diverse options and innovations for human-computer interaction, according to Huang. Data showed global smart glasses shipments grew by 210% in 2024 compared to the previous year. A further increase of 60% is projected for 2025, with a compound annual growth rate above 60% expected through 2029, Huang added. This data highlights the anticipated rapid growth in the market. items.title: The Fitness App Trusted By Millions of Women - Sweat
items.content: ### Move with confidence from bump to birth and beyond Weâ€™re here to support you through every stage of life with pregnancy and post-pregnancy options.The training styles you love ### HIIT, strength, Pilates, yoga and more Stick to your favourites or try something new with a huge range of training styles. ## Sweat sales don't get bigger than this. Kickstart your fitness journey with a massive saving. Unlock up to 50% off [...] When you visit our website, we store cookies on your browser to collect information. The information collected might relate to you, your preferences, or your device or browser, and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to and to provide a more personalized web experience. For more information about the first and third party cookies used, please follow this link: Cookie Policy User ID: 4a345ace-526d-40f1-97a0-0d534ef4b22e [...] Marketing cookies collect information such as which pages you visit on our Website(s), and how you arrived at our Website(s). Collected information is used to evaluate the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns or to provide better targeting for marketing. They perform functions like preventing the same ad from continuously reappearing, ensuring that ads are properly displayed for advertisers, and in some cases selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.

Related News Artificial Intelligence [...] HomeTechnologyArtificial IntelligenceOn-Glass Generative AI: The Next Era of Standalone Smart Glasses Artificial Intelligence # On-Glass Generative AI: The Next Era of Standalone Smart Glasses ELE Times Research Desk [...] This demonstration represents the beginning of a new era in wearable AI, in which intelligent glasses have the capability to provide tailored, real-time support on the move. items.title: China new growth: Smart glasses captivate consumers, ...
items.content: CDHK In-Depth China Daily DOCS Drone and Phone Girl City Peak Talk The Gold ADVANCED Published: 14:14, November 26, 2024 | Updated: 16:46, November 26, 2024 China new growth: Smart glasses captivate consumers, sales surge By Xinhua BEIJING - Smart glasses, powered by the thriving AI technology, have surged to the forefront of China's electronic gadget market, showcasing their potential to evolve into a more mainstream appeal. [...] A recent industry report has shown that the global smart glasses market size is estimated to grow at a compound annual growth rate of nearly 14 percent between 2023 and 2028. China has been listed as one of the most promising markets. Particularly, China's strengths include a robust consumer electronics supply chain that can fulfill the requirements for AI glasses, including components like cameras, lenses, chips, batteries and sensors, thus fostering robust competition. Joining the game [...] Major Chinese electronics manufacturers like Huawei and Xiaomi are now vying for a share in the smart glasses market. In late October, Huawei unveiled a patent aimed at cutting the standby power usage of these devices. A search for "smart glasses" on the official website of the National Intellectual Property Administration reported more than 2,000 patent application entries. : Country's smart tourism apps offer unique experiences

items.title: How glass-based chips could supercharge the next wave ...
items.content: The new generation of smart glasses, will be powered by AI to process visual data in real time: recognizing objects, translating speech, and overlaying digital information seamlessly into our field of view. > â€œThe type of speed and power weâ€™re talking about with AI isnâ€™t just about doing the same things faster, itâ€™s an enabler of applications that donâ€™t yet exist, and that we may soon not be able to live without.â€ [...] Christian Thiel 14h Report this comment Couldnâ€™t agree more. The future of high-performance computing wonâ€™t be defined by silicon alone â€” material science, especially glass, will play a decisive role in enabling AI-scale performance and efficiency. Like Reply 1 Reaction Ramon Orozco 2w Report this comment From room-sized computers to smart glasses in just a few decades. Makes you wonder what kind of breakthroughs weâ€™ll be talking about in 2050! [...] At the same time, new optical innovations in glass are transforming how we see through the lenses themselves. SCHOTTâ€™s geometric reflective waveguides, for instance, enable brighter, more immersive displays with minimal light leakage â€“ making AR glasses thinner, lighter, and closer to everyday eyewear.

Data from JD.com shows the average price of a pair of AI smart glasses has dropped from roughly 279 U.S. dollars to about 209 thanks to national subsidies and industrial chain collaborations. items.content: NEW YORK, Aug. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gauzy Ltd. (Nasdaq: GAUZ) (â€œGauzyâ€ or the â€œCompanyâ€), a global leader in vision and light control technologies, today announced it has been selected as the exclusive smart glass supplier for a Fortune 100 financial services leader. Passing rigorous testing, Gauzy was selected for its product reliability and exceptional customer service. This milestone validates Gauzyâ€™s differentiated technology and supports the Companyâ€™s strategy to scale deployments [...] Gauzyâ€™s smart glass has already been installed in multiple office locations across the United States, including Texas, Florida, and Pennsylvania, among other financial hubs. The project is expected to expand over time as new facilities are built, and existing sites are modernized. items.title: Gauzy's State-of-The-Art Smart Glass Technologies Utilized
items.content: This press release contains forward-looking statements. Forward-looking statements contained in this press release include, but are not limited to, statements regarding Gauzyâ€™s strategic and business plans, technology, relationships, objectives and expectations for its business, growth, the impact of trends on and interest in its business, intellectual property, products and its future results, operations and financial performance and condition and may be identified by the use of words such as [...] Gauzy Ltd. is a fully-integrated light and vision control company, focused on the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of vision and light control technologies that are developed to support safe, sustainable, comfortable, and agile user experiences across various industries. Headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel, the company has additional subsidiaries and entities based in Germany, France, the United States, Canada, China, Singapore, and the United Arab Emirates. Gauzy serves [...] This use of Gauzyâ€™s combined SPD and PDLC technologies highlights the strong demand and accelerating adoption of Gauzyâ€™s products by leading OEMs. The Company continues to expand its footprint in the fast-growing automotive smart glass market, projected to reach a total addressable market (TAM) of $25 billion by 2028. Mercedes-Benz officially unveiled the Vision V at the Mercedes-Benz Brand Day on April 22 and displays the show car at Auto Shanghai 2025.

items.title: Gauzy Announces First-Ever Prefabricated Smart Glass Stack for ...
items.content: NEW YORK, July 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) â€” Gauzy Ltd. (NASDAQ: GAUZ), a global leader in light and vision control technologies, today unveiled a turnkey solution designed to maximize manufacturing efficiency and accelerate smart glass adoption in the automotive sector: the first prefabricated smart glass stack. This fully industrialized product aims to support scalable integration across vehicle platforms while delivering strong value for investors. [...] The ready-to-laminate smart glass stack combines dimmable smart glass films, conductive elements, and adhesive interlayers into a single, fully industrialized unit, engineered specifically for Tier-1 suppliers and OEM glass fabricators. By eliminating costly and time-consuming post-processing steps, the technology simplifies manufacturing, reduces space needs, and lowers financial barriers, enabling new players to enter the smart glass market with faster production timelines. [...] This press release contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of the U.S. federal securities laws. These statements may include, but are not limited to, statements regarding Gauzy Ltd.â€™s expected financial performance, future growth, strategic plans, product development, market expansion, business outlook, and milestones. items.title: Gauzy Unveils New Black Suspended Particle Device (SPD) Smart ...
items.content: NEW YORK and TEL AVIV, Israel, Jan. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) â€” Gauzy Ltd. (Nasdaq: GAUZ), a global leader in light and vision control technology, is pleased to announce that it has unveiled its latest suspended particle device (SPD) Smart Glass technology at CES 2025, the most influential tech event in the world. Gauzyâ€™s first-ever black SPD Smart Glass technology has a distinguishable black appearance and was created to accommodate the robust demand from the three strong and growing markets [...] Gauzy is also showcasing several other of its groundbreaking solutions at its booth at the worldâ€™s most powerful tech event, including introducing its newly-announced Solar Powered LCGÂ® for the first time in the U.S. This transformative technology redefines the capabilities of smart glass. By embedding Gauzyâ€™s LCGÂ® PDLC and SPD technologies with transparent solar cells, Gauzy enables smart glass to harvest energy from the sun. This integration of solar cells with Gauzyâ€™s light control [...] This latest innovation positions Gauzy to further solidify its already dominant market share within the smart glass industry. The popularity of SPD Smart Glass â€“ as well as polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) Smart Glass, which the company also develops and manufactures â€“ continues to rise due to its numerous advantages over traditional shading systems and other smart glass solutions, including its ability to transition from clear to fully opaque within seconds, block more than 99% of

items.title: LCGÂ® Smart Glass Technology - Gauzy
items.content: LCGÂ® (Light Control Glass) with Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal (PDLC) or Suspended Particle Device (SPD) technology by Gauzy creates dynamic, light-controlled spaces by applying technology to new and existing glass. PDLC Smart Glass can change glass from opaque to clear giving you privacy and temperature control with the click of a switch. SPD smart glass blocks 99% of light, allowing windows to dim and tint without blocking views, making it the optimal shading choice for exterior windows [...] Gauzy manufactures two different kinds of films: one for lamination and one for retrofitting onto existing glass. PDLC technology is available as as a laminated smart glass or adhesive smart film. SPD technology is available as laminated smart glass. ## Laminated Smart Glass Support sophisticated projects from the start with films that are laminated between two pieces of glass by Gauzyâ€™s fabrication partners. ## Adhesive Smart Film [...] ## LCGÂ® Smart Glass technology is available with two distinct technologies: PDLC or SPD Gauzy is the only LCGÂ® smart glass technology company in the world that develops, manufactures, and markets both PDLC and SPD films for lamination or aftermarket installation by industry professionals. ## Gauzy PDLC Smart Glass Benefits of LCGÂ® Smart Glass with PDLC technology:

items.title: How Smart Glass Is Redefining Human-Vehicle Interaction - Gauzy
items.content: As vehicles evolve into digital living spaces, smart glass will play a central role in how we experience light, privacy, and interaction. Gauzyâ€™s technology roadmap, spanning SPD, PDLC, and hybrid glazing solutions, continues to define this evolution through performance, compliance, and manufacturability. With industry collaboration, advanced R&D, and scalable production, Gauzy is helping automakers turn intelligent glazing into a defining element of next-generation mobility. [...] As vehicles become quieter and more connected, glazing is turning into a digital interface. Gauzyâ€™s SPD (Suspended Particle Device) and PDLC (Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal) films make it possible for windows, partitions, and roofs to dynamically control transparency, improve comfort, and integrate new forms of user interaction. [...] Gauzyâ€™s technologies appear in production and concept vehicles from brands like Ferrari, Cadillac, Mercedes-Benz, and BMW, demonstrating scalability across luxury and next-generation models.

items.title: Automotive Smart Glass Market - Size, Share & Manufacturers
items.content: A feedback loop is forming: as ride-hailing companies prioritize passenger experience, they specify smart glass for their premium tiers, nudging OEMs to include pre-wire options across product lines. This latent demand feeds the passenger-car pipeline, creating a virtuous cycle of scale that lowers price points further. Therefore, the automotive smart glass market anticipates sustained momentum in personal and shared mobility segments, provided suppliers continue to drive material [...] slices collectively broaden the addressable spectrum for smart glass, allowing the automotive smart glass market to serve mainstream models that might otherwise miss the feature due to cost barriers. As tier-2 suppliers license key patents from early movers, pricing pressures are expected to sharpen, eventually compressing margins but expanding installed base. [...] By technology, electrochromic glazing led with 46.41% of the automotive smart glass market share in 2024; suspended particle devices are projected to post a 14.91% CAGR through 2030. By application, sunroof glass captured 74.08% of the automotive smart glass market size in 2024; smart HUD and display panels are forecast to expand at a 16.71% CAGR to 2030.

items.title: Best smart glasses and AR specs: We test Ray-Ban Meta, Oakley ...
items.content: The most significant developments in 2025 have come from Meta. Continuing its partnership with EssilorLuxottica, four new smart glass models were recently unveiled: the next-generation Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2, the athlete-focused Oakley Meta Vanguard, the everyday Oakley Meta HSTN, and the intriguing Ray-Ban Meta Display glasses. This signals a massive investment in the space and sets the stage for a fascinating battle for your face. [...] A collaboration between EssilorLuxottica and Nuance Audio, these smart glasses address a distinct issue: hearing loss. Disguised within a stylish pair of frames, this device is essentially a sophisticated hearing aid designed to make conversations more straightforward in noisy environments. [...] ## Meta's latest announcement have altered the glasses and AR landscapeâ€”stay up to date with this buyer's guide The smart glasses landscape has exploded in 2025. What was once a niche, experimental corner of the wearables world has become one of its most exciting frontiers, with new devices launching at a blistering pace. From AI-powered overlays to glasses that act as a personal cinema, the next generation of smart eyewear is here.

items.title: Intelligent Glass: Switchable Smart Glass & Film Solutions
items.content: Based on the latest polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) technology, Switchable Smart Glass (also known as Smart Glass or Switchable Glass) turns from frosted to clear, operating using a simple ON-OFF system, switching instantly at the press of a button. This technology offers a versatile remote-controlled privacy solution that can be used for projection and interactivity as well as assisting with security, energy concerns, and style. [...] Based on the latest polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) technology, Switchable Smart Glass (also known as Smart Glass or Switchable Glass) is glass that turns from frosted to clear, operating using a simple ON-OFF system, switching instantly at the press of a button. This technology offers a versatile remote-controlled privacy solution that can be used for projection and interactivity as well as assisting with security, energy concerns and style. ## What We Do [...] Unique to the market, Intelligent Glass also offers a Self-Adhesive Switchable Smart Film. Our Smart Film can be retrofitted to existing glass, making privacy glass simple and helping Switchable technology be even more versatile and accessible than ever. The applications for Switchable technology grow each day, and Intelligent Glass has had the pleasure of seeing Smart Glass and Smart Film used in some of the most creative and exciting installations the industry has ever seen.

items.title: Smart Glass Technologies - The experts in switchable privacy glass
items.content: Our smart glass is an investment that enhances property value, cuts operational costs, and attracts high-quality tenants. Building owners benefit from significantly reduced HVAC loads, with our glass intelligently adjusting to control heat gain and natural light, resulting in up to 30% energy savings. Learn more ### Occupants [...] For architects, our smart glass technology unlocks a new level of design versatility. By integrating our glass, architects gain the ability to control light and privacy with precision, allowing them to design open, dynamic spaces that adapt seamlessly to occupantsâ€™ needs. Learn more ### Buildings Owners [...] Transform existing glass into Smart Glass. Apply smart film to existing windows, glass walls and doors to transform them into switchable glass. Professional Installation Our vast network of certified installers is spread across ten offices in the USA, Canada. No matter where you are located, we have a team ready to meet your unique needs.Our products are manufactured right here in our Miami, Florida facility. Made in USA

items.title: The Truth About Smart Glass and Film
items.content: If you are considering privacy glass as an option for your windows, walls or doors it is helpful to consider itâ€™s overall value, as smart glass offers many other benefits in addition to providing privacy. Our smart glass is laminated and tempered, comes with built-in soundproofing and minimizes heat gain. Here is a breakdown of how much each of these features would cost if purchased separately: Tempered glass = 10$/sqft Laminated glass = $15 per sqft Smart glass blocks 99% of UV light [...] Switchable glass is the biggest innovation to come to glass technology in over a century. Both smart glass and film go from clear to frosted when powered on and off. Now, glass can be installed with built-in privacy or you can apply smart film to the surface of existing glass, transforming it into smart glass. While switchable glass technology may seem like magic and the ideal solution, there are a few things you should know before purchasing smart glass or film. [...] Smart glass and film are not as cheap as buying a standard set of curtains. Smart glass costs $80-100 dollars per square foot and smart film costs $25-40 per square foot. While you may come across some PDLC films being sold at cheap prices overseas, this is usually for a reason. Many of these films are thinner, more prone to damage and difficult to install.

items.title: Best Chinese Smart Glasses: The Definitive Guide to a New Era of ...
items.content: The world of wearable technology is on the cusp of a revolution, and itâ€™s being led by a wave of innovation emerging from the East. The concept of smart glasses, once a futuristic fantasy, is now a tangible reality, and the best Chinese smart glasses are not just competing on the global stageâ€”they are redefining it. These devices are no longer clunky prototypes but sophisticated pieces of technology designed to seamlessly integrate digital information with our physical reality. Imagine walking [...] The current generation of smart glasses is impressive, but it is merely a stepping stone. The trajectory of innovation points towards even more immersive and integrated experiences. We are moving towards devices that are indistinguishable from traditional eyewear in weight and style but pack the computational power of a smartphone. Advances in artificial intelligence will make interactions more contextual and predictiveâ€”the glasses will anticipate your information needs before you even ask. [...] and weight, ensuring they could be worn all day without causing fatigue or social awkwardness. This user-centric approach, combined with aggressive R&D investment, has propelled Chinese companies to the forefront of the smart glasses revolution, creating a new product category that blends fashion with high-functionality computing.

items.title: DNP's Technologies for Next-Gen AR Glasses/VR Headset
items.content: Expected to be used in XR devices and cameras, DNP's polymer lenses offer low birefringence and high glass transition temperature, mitigating light leakage and image focus distortion.Features:- Low birefringence- Low retardation- Low photoelastic coefficient ### Formable functional film\under development | | | | [...] Products and Services Japanese(Open in a new window) Contact(Open in a new window) # DNP's Technologies for Next-Gen AR Glasses/VR Headset Empowering AR/VR experience with five areas of technologies DNP is making strides in technologies for next-generation AR glasses, VR headset, and MR devices, utilizing the advanced fine patterning, precise coating, and ultrafine etching technology. [...] DNP has been developing a surface relief grating waveguide, using nanoimprint technology. Leveraging our expertise in photomask manufacturing, DNP can provide master molds with multi-steps or any angle patterns. With collaboration partners, we are pursuing the mass production of high precision waveguides for AR glasses by taking advantage of the â€œhard to hardâ€ imprinting process.Features:- One-stop shop solution (master mold making ~wafer delivery)

items.title: What's New | DNP Group
items.content: The latest 30 news releases and various news items announced by DNP.

items.title: AI smart glasses with 'way cooler' apps hit meteoric rise â€“ analyst
items.content: The smart glasses market is expected to continue its meteoric rise into 2026, and fortunately, tariff policies haven't had a significant impact on the smart glasses market. In addition, Counterpoint forecasts the smart glasses market to grow at a CAGR of over 60% between 2024 and 2029. ## About the Author Kelsey Ziser Senior Editor, Light Reading Kelsey is a senior editor at Light Reading, co-host of the Light Reading podcast, and host of the "What's the story?" podcast. [...] The smart glasses market is experiencing a resurgence after the first iteration of Google Glass flopped in 2015. In the first half of 2025, global smart glasses shipments increased 110% year-over-year (YoY), and demand for AI-enabled smart glasses is outpacing that of traditional smart glasses, according to Counterpoint Research . [...] Smartphones & Devices AI & Machine Learning 5G News # AI smart glasses with 'way cooler' apps hit meteoric rise â€“ analyst Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses have played a marked role in boosting the smart glasses market, according to Counterpoint Research. In addition, demand for AI smart glasses is outpacing that of their 'basic' smart glasses counterparts. Kelsey Ziser , Senior Editor , Light Reading August 27, 2025 5 Min Read (Source: Tero Vesalainen/Alamy)

items.title: Advancing organizational transformation for business innovation
items.content: Founded in 1876, Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd. (DNP) is one of the worldâ€™s largest printing companies, employing over 37,000 people globally. With a portfolio spanning Smart Communication, Life & Healthcare, and Electronics, DNP is guided by its brand statement, â€œCreating future standards.â€ and a commitment to connect people and society while advancing sustainability. [...] As part of this commitment, DNP has long embraced emerging technologies. In April 2023, the company made a strategic decision to adopt AI across the organization. By May, DNP had built a secure environment for enterprise-wide use. In February 2025, the company launched ChatGPT Enterprise across ten core departments. Within three months, results included: [...] DNP is modernizing IT governance with ChatGPT Enterprise. Masahiro Kobayashi, General Manager of System Infrastructure Development Division, ICT Center, Information Innovation Operations, highlighted improvements in tasks that were once manual and inconsistent:

items.content: In recent years, research has advanced on new ways of using holograms in society by leveraging their ability to disperse and concentrate light.

items.title: Smart Window Technology Explained for Modern Buildings
items.content: SPD smart glass blocks up most of light, delivers rapid privacy on demand, and reduces noise while protecting interiors from UV radiation. The technology supports both manual and automated control systems and can be laminated into curved or custom-shaped glass. SPD smart glass is ideal for premium applications, such as automotive roofs, aircraft, marine environments, and high-end architectural facades. It eliminates the need for traditional shades, offering a clean, modern aesthetic and [...] Smart glass windows have transformed the transportation sector by enhancing passenger comfort and operational efficiency. In vehicles and railways, smart glass provides privacy on demand, UV protection, and temperature regulation. These features reduce cooling costs and improve the passenger experience. Automated controls allow passengers or operators to adjust smart glass windows instantly, eliminating the need for mechanical blinds and reducing maintenance. [...] ### Liquid Crystal Smart Glass Liquid crystal smart glass stands out as one of the most versatile switchable smart glass technologies available today. This category includes both dye liquid crystal and PDLC smart glass, each offering unique performance characteristics and application benefits.

items.title: CES 2025: BOE Brings the Future of Displays to Life - BOE America
items.content: Skip to content # CES 2025: BOE Brings the Future of Displays to Life At CES 2025 in Las Vegas, BOE showcased over 60 innovative products and solutions, cementing its position as a global leader in display and IoT technology. With cutting-edge advancements in LCD, Mini LED, and IoT applications, BOE demonstrated how its â€œPowered by BOEâ€ ecosystem is shaping the future of consumer electronics. BOE ADS Pro: Revolutionizing LCD Displays [...] In addition, BOEâ€™s intelligent cockpit solutions, such as biometric steering wheels and glasses-free 3D screens, showcased a seamless integration of health monitoring, entertainment, and office capabilities into vehicles. Features like real-time ECG monitoring ensure safety, while wood-grain displays and flexible screens elevate the driving experience. AI Media Center: Smarter Living Through IoT Solutions [...] BOEâ€™s â€œAI Media Centerâ€ debuted as a proof-of-concept 65-inch 4K device powered by Qualcommâ€™s QCS8550 chip. Designed to be more than just a screen, it introduces features like: â€¢ Synchronized Viewing: Enjoy movies with friends remotely. â€¢ Real-Time Translation: Break language barriers during video calls. â€¢ Smart Home Control: Manage connected devices seamlessly. â€¢ AI-Assisted Features: Plan trips or create stories with generative AI.

items.content: People's Daily Interview with Wicue: Shenzhen Glasses Tide Up Make Glasses More Technological "We want to integrate more technological elements into the traditional eyewear industry and make eyewear more technological." Li Fenghua, the chairman of Wicue, said that he hopes to play with the technical advantages of the company and contribute to the development of "branding" of the whole Shenzhen eyewear industry. More Previous1Next ## Technology [...] On the morning of June 30th, Wicue's automotive light-dark dimming glass film project opened in Pinghu Park, Zhangjiang Yangtze River Delta Science and Technology City. More 2021-06-22 The Demand for Transparent Dimming Creates a New Market of 100 Billion, and Wicue Dimming Film Breaks Through the Application of Vehicle Regulation Level Wicue recently completed a 200 million RMB B round financing from Walden International. More 2022-11-30 [...] WICUE Glasses redefine sunglasses. WICUE Glasses combine quality, comfort, and technology in one, constantly breaking boundaries through technological innovation. The award-winning work, WICUE 3039, features a low-key and timeless design that never goes out of style. More 2021-07-01 The Wicue Automotive Dimming Glass Film Project With a Total Investment of 1.5 Billion Yuan Officially Opened in Pinghu Zhejiang Today

items.title: Alibaba Launches New Quark AI Glasses Series in China ...
items.content: Powered by Qwen, Quark AI Glasses provide intelligent, hands-free assistance for everyday life, combining voice and vision to enable real-time AI interactions. From instant price recognition and AI-powered Q&A (both text and image-based) to on-the-go translation, near-eye navigation, AI-generated meeting notes, smart reminders, live teleprompter, and context-aware support like finding nearby spots and managing schedules, the Glasses bring AI seamlessly into the physical world. Deeply integrated [...] â€œLooking ahead, AI glasses open the door to a revolutionary way of connecting and interacting with computers in the AI era. With Quark AI Glasses deeply integrated with Qwen, users can access Qwen anytime, anywhere, enabling the AI to connect seamlessly with the real world and deliver value at an unprecedented scaleâ€ ,said Wu. [...] The new Quark AI Glasses are now available for purchase on major Chinese e-commerce platforms including Tmall, JD.com and Douyin, and are rolling out in 604 partner optical stores across 82 cities nationwide in China.
