items.title: Smart Glasses Market Analysis 2025: A Vision of the Future
items.content: Market analysis consistently points toward explosive growth between now and 2025. Driven by falling component costs, maturing software ecosystems, and a post-pandemic emphasis on hands-free digital access, the compound annual growth rate (CAGR) is projected to be in the high double digits. The total market valuation, which rested in the low billions just a few years ago, is forecast to multiply several times over, potentially reaching a staggering figure that signifies its arrival as a major [...] Regionally, North America currently holds the largest market share, driven by strong enterprise adoption and the presence of major technology players. However, the Asia-Pacific region is expected to witness the highest growth rate through 2025. This is fueled by massive manufacturing hubs in China, South Korea, and Taiwan, a thriving consumer electronics market, and significant government investment in AR technology and 5G infrastructure across the region. [...] The stage is set, the players are in position, and the technology is rapidly maturing. The smart glasses market analysis for 2025 paints a picture of a technology transitioning from its awkward adolescence into a powerful and mature toolset. It will be a story of two parallel tracks: the continued, solid growth of enterprise applications delivering concrete business value, and the exciting, unpredictable emergence of consumer applications that will redefine how we see and interact with the

items.title: Eyes on the future: Smart glasses - Bank of America Institute
items.content: AI glasses, a type of smart eyeglasses that provide audio and visual capabilities to users, have gained traction since early 2024. With tech giants entering the space and shipments expected to exceed 10 million units in 2025, AI glasses are currently driving the smart glasses market â€” but consumer interest may fall as augmented reality (AR) glasses gain momentum. [...] #### Regional Roundup: Upswing in spending eludes the South Slower wage growth and a relatively weak tourism season appears to have restrained the southern economy. 2 min read september 2025 #### On the clock: Agentic AI in the workplace Enterprise adoption of agentic AI is in its early stages, but companies are laying the groundwork for increased investment. 2 min read [...] Read our full analysis for a more in-depth look at these trends. items.title: The Rise of Smart Glasses, From Novelty to Necessity | IDC Blog
items.content: Smart glasses are a rapidly growing market as technological advances are beginning to make the form factor viable. Further advances in technology, greater consumer awareness, and new entrants into the market will likely continue this growth into the long run (IDC is currently forecasting 18.7 million units in 2029 compared to 2.7 million units in our most recent full year of data 2024). A little way off the 1.44 billion mobile phones sold worldwide in 2024, but if there is any product [...] market for a discreet solution to help individuals with hearing loss and foreign language translation, which could create a significant tail wing for smart glasses sales. [...] ### Conclusion & Forecast

items.title: Electrochromic Materials Market Size & Share Analysis
items.content: The electrochromic materials market stands at USD 1.98 billion in 2025 and is projected to grow to USD 2.92 billion by 2030, advancing at an 8.06% CAGR. The growth reflects mandatory energy-efficiency codes, falling device costs, and rapid product commercialization across buildings, vehicles, and aircraft. Dynamic glazing lowers building cooling loads by up to 39.5%, positioning the electrochromic materials market as a preferred solution for net-zero construction. Cost breakthroughs have cut [...] Metal oxides accounted for 49.42% of 2024 revenue, anchoring the electrochromic materials market with proven tungsten-oxide stability. The segmentâ€™s cycling durability surpasses 100,000 cycles at 60 Â°C, and titanium-intercalated WOâ‚ƒ reaches 85% optical modulation and 95.61% reversibility. Conducting polymers trail yet post a 10.69% CAGR, propelled by PEDOT and polyaniline flexibility that suits rollable displays. MoSâ‚‚-doped PEDOT achieves 70.28% coloration depth, narrowing performance gaps. items.content: The global smart glass market size was valued at USD 7.07 billion in 2024 and is projected to reach from USD 7.83 billion in 2025 to USD 17.65 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 10.7% during the forecast period (2025-2033). Factors such as surging demand for smart glass-based products and high adoption in the transportation sector, significantly drives the smart glass market demand by 2033. [...] The aerospace and transportation sector is projected to emerge as a major client for smart glass applicability, thereby contributing to market revenue. The commercialization of SPD smart glass has uncovered several opportunities, such as rearview mirrors, smart glass installations in side-view windows, and sunroofs. These glasses reduce the built-up heat within the vehicles due to their ability to block solar heat gain. SPD automotive rear and side windows and sunroofs greatly benefit [...] SPD glass's fast-switching features and infinite tuning features reduce unwanted glare and light, enabling users to enjoy not only the outdoor view but also the glare-free view of displays and video screens. The heat-blocking features improve fuel efficiency and reduce carbon emissions in vehicles. The majority of contemporary aircraft models encompass SPD windows. SPD windows block the cabin heat buildup, reduce maintenance costs, and block UV radiation to protect the interiors. Therefore,

Asia Pacific captures the majority share of the market, due to the expanding aftermarket sector and the increasing customer base in the area. [...] Based on type of technology, the automotive glass market is segmented into standard glass and smart glass. According to estimates, currently, the smart glass segment captures the majority of the market. This growth can be attributed to various types of smart glass, including electrochromic, Polymer Dispersed Liquid Devices (PDLC), and Suspended Particle Devices (SPD), along with their associated advantages.

Photochromic lenses, which adjust their tint based on the intensity of sunlight, are becoming increasingly popular among consumers for their convenience and eye protection benefits. The demand for photochromic eyewear, automotive components, and smart electronic devices is driving the market growth in this region. items.title: Chromic Materials Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Merck
items.content: Chromic materials are compounds that exhibit changes in color or properties when exposed to external stimuli such as light, heat, electricity, pressure, or gases. Key categories include photochromic materials, which react to light and are commonly used in eyewear; thermochromic materials, which respond to temperature changes and are applied in textiles and packaging; and electrochromic materials, which alter color under electrical input and are used in smart windows and mirrors. [...] Other types include piezochromic materials, which react to pressure, and gasochromic materials, which change properties when exposed to certain gases. The market for chromic materials is expanding due to growing interest in energy-efficient and smart technologies, although high production costs and complex manufacturing processes remain significant challenges. Continued research and development are broadening their applications in sustainable and adaptive technologies across multiple [...] Displays and screens leverage electrochromic and photochromic effects to enable dynamic visuals, and photochromic materials in ophthalmic lenses adjust tint according to light conditions. These applications are powered by fundamental chromic technologies, including photochromism (light sensitivity), thermochromism (temperature sensitivity), electrochromism (response to electrical input), piezochromism (pressure sensitivity), gasochromism (gas detection), and other advanced chromic mechanisms -

items.title: Chromic Materials Market, Industry Size Forecast Report [Latest]
items.content: Thermochromism accounts for the largest market share, based on technology, in the chromic materials market due to its application in various industries. Thermochromic materials change color upon a change in temperature and have widespread applications in smart windows, apparel, package structures, and consumer products for functional as well as esthetic uses. They improve energy efficiency and user experience; they also offer visual indications, thereby making them very modern and sustainable. [...] Chromic materials are materials that display reversible color changes on exposure to some external stimulus like light, temperature, electricity, solvents, or mechanical operations. Some of the examples of such materials are photochromic materials responding to light, thermochromic materials responding to temperature variations, and electrochromic materials responding to electrical currents. Chromic effects find extensive use in areas such as anti-counterfeiting, data storage, fabrics, and [...] The longevity of chromic materials, particularly for outdoor or high-exposure use, is another significant restraint to the market. Chromic materials exhibit reversible property change with light, heat, or electricity exposure, but over time, their ability to do so can be lost due to chronic exposure to erosive ambient conditions such as UV, temperature, and humidity. For example, photochromic devices used in self-darkening windows or glasses may start to lose efficacy in color change after

items.title: Smart Glass and Smart Window Market Size & Forecast, 2034
items.content: The Global Smart Glass and Smart Window Market was valued at $6.7 billion in 2024, and is projected to reach $29.7 billion by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 16.5% from 2025 to 2034. Smart glass, also known as smart windows, intelligent glass, or switchable glass, is an advanced product that can change its optical properties in response to external stimuli or user commands. When activated, these next-generation adaptive glass adjust the glass's light transmission, enabling privacy control, glare [...] The smart glass and smart window market is further segmented by end user, with key industries including automotive, aviation, marine, and construction. The construction sector held the largest smart glass and smart window market in 2024 and is projected to grow at a significant compound annual growth rate (CAGR) from 2025 to 2034. [...] The smart glass and smart window industry is anticipated to expand significantly during the forecast period, owing to a surge in demand for smart glass-based products in the construction sector. This technology is increasingly adopted due to its energy efficiency and aesthetic appeal, which can reduce energy consumption. Smart glass helps regulate light and heat transmission, thus enhancing the comfort and sustainability of both commercial and residential buildings.

items.title: Defending and Promoting the Glass Industry
items.content: NGA staff and consultants went to Capitol Hill last week to meet with federal legislators to discuss expanding the investment tax credit for high-performance windows. Currently, Section 48 of the Internal Revenue Code (IRC) includes an investment tax credit only available for electrochromic glass. NGAâ€™s request is to expand the types of high-performance windows eligible for the investment tax credit to also include other types of dynamic glass, as well as triple glazing and vacuum insulated [...] glazing (VIG). NGA is also requesting an extension on the deadline of the credit, which is set to expire on Jan. 1, 2025. Any construction needs to begin before that date to be eligible. [...] Expanding glass eligibility and extending the deadline can give building owners more high-performance window options and yield more opportunity to receive the tax credit to offset costs. It would also have a favorable impact on energy efficiency and the electrical grid, and translate into more manufacturing, fabricating and installing work for the entire glass and glazing supply chain.

January 26, 2024 Gentex to Demonstrate Innovation in Automotive, Aerospace, Fire Protection, and Medical Technologies at CES 2024 [...] ZEELAND, Jan. 08, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gentex Corporation (NASDAQ: GNTX ), a leading supplier of electro-optical products for the global automotive, aerospace, and fire protection industries, today announced a partnership agreement with Solace Power , an innovative wireless power transfer January 8, 2024 Gentex Announces eSight Acquisition Set to Showcase Advanced Vision Tech at CES 2024

items.title: Gentex To Unveil the Next Generation of Its Dimmable Glass, Vision ...
items.content: This year at CES, Gentex will unveil the next generation of HomeLink, which will be compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, operate a broad range of smart home products from leading brands such as Amazon and Samsung Smart Things, and allow users to operate certain Wi-Fi-connected garage doors via smartphone or vehicle-integrated app. For more information, see this separate news release. items.content: This year at CES, Gentex will unveil the next generation of HomeLink, which will be compatible with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, operate a broad range of smart home products from leading brands such as Amazon and Samsung Smart Things, and allow users to operate certain Wi-Fi-connected garage doors via smartphone or vehicle-integrated app. For more information, see this separate news release. [...] When it comes to dimmable glass, Gentex is the recognized global leader, shipping over 50 million dimmable devices annually, including anti-glare interior and exterior rearview mirrors for the automotive industry and electronically dimmable windows (EDWs) for the aerospace sector. At CES 2025, Gentex will showcase the next generation of it large-area dimmable devices, including dimmable sunroofs and sun visors. items.title: Gentex Unveils the Next Generation of Its Dimmable Glass, Vision ...
items.content: # Gentex Unveils the Next Generation of Its Dimmable Glass, Vision, Sensing, and Connectivity Products Published: March 3, 2025James Hickey Adobe/Summit Art Creations [...] When it comes to dimmable glass, Gentex is the recognized global leader, shipping over 50 million dimmable devices annually, including anti-glare interior and exterior rearview mirrors for the automotive industry and electronically dimmable windows (EDWs) for the aerospace sector. At CES 2025, Gentex showcased the next generation of it large-area dimmable devices, including dimmable sunroofs and sun visors. For the first time, Gentex will showcase a new dimmable film technology for large [...] Since its launch in 2016, Gentexâ€™s Full Display Mirror (FDM) has become the industryâ€™s leading digital rearview mirror. It combines a custom camera and mirror-integrated video display for enhanced rearward visibility. The FDM is currently offered on over 29 different automaker brands and 124 different vehicles around the world. New for 2025 will be a premium FDM with integrated OLED screen for enhanced display clarity, and a water-shedding camera lens technology for keeping the FDM camera clean

items.title: Smart window manufacturer announces 147 layoffs at Olive Branch ...
items.content: Skip to content Advertise with Us Mid-South Heroes Downtown Destinations Chick-fil-A Community Champions Color the Weather Healthier 901 Share Your Pics # Smart window manufacturer announces 147 layoffs at Olive Branch plant By Lydian Coombs Published: Oct. 11, 2024 at 2:21 PM CDT OLIVE BRANCH, Miss. (WMC) - A smart glass window manufacturer has laid off 147 employees at its Olive Branch, Mississippi, manufacturing plant. [...] View Operating Corporation (View) filed a WARN notice with the Tennessee Department of Labor on October 3, announcing the permanent layoffs. According to the documentation, nearly half of those workers reside in Tennessee. View employees do not have bumping rights. The Greater Memphis Local Workforce Development Board will coordinate services to help affected workers.

items.title: 2025 Trends in Window Technology: Innovations Shaping the Future
items.content: A hallmark of modern window innovation is the advent of smart glass that can automatically adjust its level of tint based on external conditions. These â€œadaptive shadingâ€ windows rely on electrochromic, photochromic, or thermochromic materials to shift their opacity. In 2025, expect to see faster transitions between different tint levels, as well as improved color stability. items.title: SageGlass Case Study - J2 Innovations
items.content: SageGlass, a global electrochromic glass provider owned by Saint-Gobain, sees its dynamic glass as the ultimate link between the built and natural environments. Improving how people experience buildings is the fundamental driver behind making buildings smart, comfortable and efficient. With a portfolio of dynamically tinting glass, SageGlass was looking for a software framework that could be fully customized and able to incorporate data from a range of hardware to ensure its turn-key systems [...] SageGlass Maestro is a control and management software for SageGlass products based on FIN Framework. The SageGlass and J2 development teams worked together to develop a flexible, smart system that considers project-specific inputs, along with real-time exterior sensor data, to deliver ease of project design, installation, and commissioning, as well as automated tinting, control and management post-installation. [...] Log In Help Center ### Case Study: # SageGlassÂ® ### SageGlass develops electronically tintable smart glass (also called dynamic glass), for use in building windows, skylights and curtainwalls, that can be electronically tinted or cleared to optimize daylight and improve occupant comfort in buildings ### SageGlass ###### Industry: Smart glass ###### HQ: Faribault, MN, USA ###### Technology: SageGlass Maestro powered by FIN Framework ###### Published: February 2022

items.title: SageGlass Selected for World's Largest Smart Glass Project
items.content: SageGlass, a supplier of electrochromic glass, was chosen by Bagmane Group, one of Indiaâ€™s largest build-to-suit real estate developers, to create what is expected to be the largest smart glass installation in the world. SageGlass will provide 200,000 square feet of itsHarmony electrochromic glass, controls and software for Rio Business Park, a 1.6 million square foot office development in Bangalore, India. [...] â€œWe strive to create premiere workplace experiences for our world-class customers,â€ said Aditya Bagmane, director at Bagmane Group. â€œFor this office development, we are working with a tech customer who expects the best. We chose SageGlass for this innovative building because of their superior smart glass offering, ability to invest in cutting-edge technology, and Saint-Gobainâ€™s presence in India.â€ [...] â€œAs employee wellness and sustainability become higher priorities for savvy building owners, SageGlass is in a unique position to deliver both,â€ says Namrata Vora, SageGlass vice president of sales, North America and India/Asia Pacific. â€œWe are so pleased to partner with Bagmane Group to create a healthy, sustainable workplace for their tenants at Rio Business Park.â€

items.title: SageGlass RealToneâ„¢: a breakthrough for electrochromic glazing
items.content: The result of years of development and feedback from architects, RealToneâ„¢ is a game-changer. SageGlass, a major player in smart glass, has found a way to eliminate the traditional bluish appearance of electrochromic glazing without compromising its efficiency. [...] Linkedin Youtube # SageGlass RealToneâ„¢: a breakthrough for electrochromic glazing NEWSProduct news SageGlass, a Saint-Gobain Group subsidiary, has announced a major breakthrough in smart glazing with the launch of RealToneâ„¢. This new electrochromic solution offers unprecedented aesthetic appeal, meeting strong demand from architects. [...] Linkedin Youtube

items.title: Video - Webinar: GW-News Talks â€œThe clever switchâ€
items.content: This time, Fredrik FrÃ¤nding and Johnny D. Engfeldt of ChromoGenics have been talking to us about â€œThe clever switchâ€, in other words, sun shading for personal comfort and energy saving using smart and switchable glass. The Swedish company ChromoGenics produces smart dynamic glass that among other properties helps to reduce energy consumption and operational costs in buildings. ConverLight Dynamic is a product based on an interlayer that can be laminated into LSG. [...] Skip to main navigation Skip to site search Our partners Home Events Video # Webinar: GW-News Talks â€œThe clever switchâ€ 09/30/2022 | Print view In this â€“ for the time being â€“ last video from our series of GW-News Talks, Frederik FrÃ¤nding and Johnny D. Engfeldt of ChromoGenics have been talking to us about switchable glass in general as well as the companyâ€™s specific solution.

items.title: ChromoGenics wins another ConverLight Dynamic glass order for ...
items.content: ChromoGenics is a proptech company that produces dynamic glass for real estate. The companyâ€™s product ConverLightÂ® Dynamic, controls indoor comfort with high daylight transmission, great view and solar heat blocking and thereby reduces cost of cooling. ConverLightÂ® Dynamic is based on a patented solution where electrochromic coatings are laminated in plastic film and then laminated between glass. The plastic film is easy to transport, so long shipments of bulky glass can be avoided. [...] ChromoGenics also offers static glass, ConverLightÂ® Static, and the ConverLightÂ® Energy facade glass solution. ChromoGenicsâ€™ stock was listed on Nasdaq First North Growth Market in 2017 and has supplied glass technology to several major real estate companies. [...] About ChromoGenics

items.title: ChromoGenics AB: We are the performance glass pioneers!
items.content: of these cookies may affect your browsing experience. [...] SAVE & ACCEPT [...] Welcome to brighter and smarter solar control with electrochromic glazing from ConverLightÂ®, reducing energy costs and enhancing comfort. Discover ConverLightÂ® ## LIGHT AND DARKNESS, HEAT AND COLD The sun shapes our climate. ChromoGenics creates high-performance facade glass that harmonizes with it. Experience brighter indoor environments, smarter solar control, and reduced energy costs. Welcome to a sustainable future with ConverLightÂ®. Follow us

items.title: Google Glass: Where Will It Fit In Agriculture? - Farm Progress
items.content: On Thursday, he demonstrated some of the capabilities of this technology at The Big Data Conference at the American Royal in Kansas City, an eye-opener for a lot of people, including myself. Agricultural potential Smart glasses like Google Glass have two potential markets, Rasa says. Of course, there's the consumer side, but there's also the business side, including agriculture, construction, and manufacturing. [...] A step in the right direction Rasa projects Glass to be officially launched in late 2014 or early 2015. This technology is still new, and when it is launched, Google Glass will be the "Model T" of smart glass technology â€“ there are still some updates needed before it becomes widely-adopted in agriculture, he adds. [...] "There were roughly ten or 15 years of experimentation where cell phone vendors tried to take a feature phone and give it more capabilities, but they had problems like being overly complex or low battery life. But they kept plugging away at it. Eventually the right features came together with the iPhone," he says, adding the same thing will likely happen with smart glasses in agriculture. "I'm convinced it's going to happen, but it's going to take some time."

items.title: The Benefits of Smart Glass for Agricultural Machinery - Gauzy
items.content: Smart glass technology for agricultural machines is a game changer for OEMs and cabin suppliers. By enhancing operator comfort, productivity, and safety, smart glass not only meets the contemporary demands of farmers but also positions your products at the forefront of innovation. As agricultural challenges evolve, integrating smart glass into your designs will ensure your offerings remain competitive and relevant. [...] One of the main concerns for farmers is maintaining a comfortable working environment, especially during long hours spent in the cabs of agricultural machines. Smart glass allows for the regulation of the amount of light and heat entering the cabin. For example, on sunny days, the glass can be darkened to reduce glare and limit heat buildup. This improves visibility by minimizing screen glare and intense reflections, helping to prevent operator fatigue and heat stress. [...] Smart glass, also known as electronic dimmable glass or switchable glass, is a type of glazing that can change its transparency when subjected to an electric current. This change allows the glass to transition from transparent to opaque, or to intermediate states, as needed, providing among other benefits, shading, glare reduction, and IR control. This type of glass is increasingly being used in vehicles, smart buildings, and now in agricultural machinery. 1. Enhanced Operator Comfort

items.title: AR glasses offer window into technology's role in China's food security
items.content: A suite of perceptive, artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled agricultural devices was recently unveiled at an expo in China focused on the grain, oilseed, and soybean industries, including one unexpected addition: augmented reality (AR) glasses. CCTV News reported on Monday that the glasses function as a portable crop-health analysis tool integrating AI with Internet-of-Things sensors. [...] Despite these challenges, continued development appears certain. Devices such as the AR glasses showcased at the latest expo offer a tangible view of the potential future of "AI + agriculture" in China. Such innovations are expected to drive growth across the agricultural sector and help strengthen the foundations of the country's food security, supporting stability even amid continuous changes in international markets. [...] When worn by farmers, signs of leaf disease and variations in soil-moisture levels become "clearly visible," it said. Although the technology is not yet widely deployed, the device provides a clear window into how China is incorporating digital tools into agricultural practices to reinforce the foundations of food security.

items.title: Smart Glass Market Growth Analysis - Size and Forecast 2024-2028
items.content: In January 2024, Asahi Glass Co. (AGC), a leading player in the market, announced the launch of its new product, "AGC Moristar i-Flex," a flexible smart glass solution for automotive applications (AGC Press Release, 2024). This innovation marks a significant step towards the mass adoption of smart glass technology in the automotive sector. [...] | Market Scope | | Report Coverage | Details | | Page number | 102 | | Base year | 2023 | | Historic period | 2018-2022 | | Forecast period | 2024-2028 | | Growth momentum & CAGR | Accelerate at a CAGR of 16.1% | | Market growth 2024-2028 | USD 8.70 billion | | Market structure | Fragmented | | YoY growth 2023-2024(%) | 15.28 | | Key countries | US, Canada, Germany, UK, Italy, France, China, India, Japan, Brazil, Egypt, UAE, Oman, Argentina, KSA, UAE, Brazil, and Rest of World (ROW) | [...] Smart glass, a technologically advanced glazing solution, offers businesses significant energy savings by controlling the transmission of light and heat. This innovation optimizes natural light usage, reducing the dependence on artificial lighting, and minimizing energy consumption. The market for smart glass is expanding, with an estimated 15% of the global glazing market share in 2021. Furthermore, industry experts anticipate a 17% increase in smart glass adoption within the next three years.

items.title: Google partners with Chinese startup for smart glasses comeback
items.content: Longcheer began expanding into the VR/AR sector as early as 2015. According to its 2024 annual report, the company has delivered more than two million units of smart glasses in collaboration with leading global internet and technology clients. [...] Longcheer, a Shanghai-based original design manufacturer (ODM) specializing in smart electronics, is behind XREAL's AR glasses. The company has produced electronic devices for global tech giants including Xiaomi, Samsung Electronics and OPPO. According to data from Counterpoint, Longcheer captured approximately 33 percent of global ODM smartphone shipments in 2024, ranking as the world's largest smartphone ODM by volume. [...] "So, we still see this needs to be a joint collaboration between tech companies, including tech giants and brilliant startups across the world," Wu added. Disassembled components of XREA's AR glasses are arranged on a brightly lit surface, June 11, 2025. /XREAL Disassembled components of XREA's AR glasses are arranged on a brightly lit surface, June 11, 2025. /XREAL A robust growing supply chain in China

items.title: Smart Glass Market to Reach $10.8 Billion by 2029, Growing at 11.7 ...
items.content: BOSTON, April 1, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- According to the latest study from BCC Research, the demand for Global Markets and Technologies for Smart Glass is grow from $6.2 billion in 2024 to reach $10.8 billion by the end of 2029, at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 11.7% from 2024 through 2029. [...] | | | --- | | Report Metric | Details | | Base year considered | 2023 | | Forecast period considered | 2024-2029 | | Base year market size | $5.6 billion | | Market size forecast | $10.8 billion | | Growth rate | CAGR of 11.7% from 2024 to 2029 | | Segments covered | Type, Technology, End-use Industry, and Region | | Regions covered | North America, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and the Rest of the World (South America and the Middle East and Africa) | [...] Terms Privacy Your Privacy Choices CA Privacy Notice Feedback Â© 2025 All rights reserved. About our ads Advertising Careers # Yahoo Finance Yahoo Finance Mail Sign in This is a paid press release. Contact the press release distributor directly with any inquiries. # Smart Glass Market to Reach $10.8 Billion by 2029, Growing at 11.7% CAGR PR Newswire 3 min read

items.title: Alibaba Releases AI Glasses in Rare Consumer Gadget Foray
items.content: (Bloomberg) -- Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. began sales of its first smart glasses powered by its Qwen AI models, marking a rare foray into consumer hardware. [...] The new Quark S1 glasses include built-in translucent displays that superimpose contextual information on the userâ€™s view of surroundings. Equipped with cameras, bone conduction microphones and swappable batteries rated to last 24 hours, this new product aims to offer the Chinese market something along the lines of Meta Platforms Inc.â€™s Ray-Ban smart glasses. Most Read from Bloomberg [...] â€œAlibabaâ€™s entry will undoubtedly bring new dynamics to the competitive landscape of Chinaâ€™s smart eyewear market,â€ said IDC research director Sophie Pan. More recently, Metaâ€™s $799 Ray-Ban Display pair showed a more ambitious approach to the category, with integrated screens and a separate wrist band for gesture controls. Metaâ€™s most advanced model is bulkier, heavier and pricier than usual, but it has drawn the contours of a promising path for development.

items.title: Alibaba previews its first AI-powered glasses, joining heated race
items.content: Alibaba Group Holding has entered the fierce smart glasses race in China, previewing its first pair of AI-powered glasses at the World Artificial Intelligence Conference (WAIC) in Shanghai â€“ the countryâ€™s largest annual AI event. [...] This marks Alibabaâ€™s debut in the smart glasses market, which has seen heightened local competition as domestic firms like Rokid and Xreal have rushed to release new products in recent months. Alibaba, owner of the Post, also struck a partnership with augmented reality glasses maker RayNeo earlier this year to provide AI support for the Hong Kong-based companyâ€™s products. Advertisement [...] The Quark AI glasses, named after Alibabaâ€™s AI assistant, were showcased to the public for the first time at the event on Saturday. The company said it had completed development of the product and was aiming for an official launch this year, although no specific date was provided.

items.title: Jiangsu Suchuan Technology Co., Ltd
items.content: Jiangsu Su Chuan Technology Co., Ltd. is the first enterprise in China to realize the mass production of ultra-thin flexible glass substrate. It has the world's leading ultra-thin flexible glass substrate processing technology. Its core team comes from China and South Korea. [...] ABOUT NEWS Company news Industry news Corporate culture PRODUCT R & D CENTER CONTACT Talent recruitment ä¸­æ–‡ ABOUT NEWS Company news Industry news Corporate culture PRODUCT R & D CENTER CONTACT Talent recruitment World's top ultra thin flexible glass substrate processing technology Smart life, smart wear, smart travel, smart education and smart office M O R E World's top ultra thin flexible glass substrate processing technology [...] At present, the company is preparing to build the world's largest R & D and manufacturing base of ultra-thin flexible glass, and is committed to becoming a leading enterprise in the world's ultra-thin flexible glass substrate industry. Ultra thin flexible glass is the core substrate for the production of fully flexible display screen and fully flexible sensor. items.title: Feature: Chinese startup brings cutting-edge AI glasses to the masses
items.content: Zhu, known as "Misa" in tech circles, recently showcased the same model, Rokid Glasses, at an experience store in his hometown, Yujiang District of Yingtan City, in east China's Jiangxi Province, a region long regarded as a trade and production hub for eyewear. What made that February moment stand out wasn't just the technology; it was how seamlessly the glasses blended into everyday life. [...] While similar products from other companies failed to win over consumers, Rokid is now facing the challenge of fulfilling orders on time, with over 300,000 units already sold. "We didn't expect to be overwhelmed this quickly," Zhu admitted. He is convinced that smart glasses are set to become the next transformative platform after smartphones. However, he acknowledges the industry is still in its early stages, with the main challenge being educating the market to attract more users. [...] Around 90 percent of Rokid's funding goes into research and development (R&D), which makes it a highly R&D-driven company even by global standards. "Our booth is very popular in the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas," Zhu said. He noted that Rokid aims to make smart glasses an affordable everyday tech product. Priced at around 3,000 yuan, they are far more accessible than many international models that cost over 10,000 yuan.

items.title: China Smart Glass Manufacturer and Suppliers - Huichi
items.content: - Smart Privacy Glass + EVA Film - Extra clear EVA Film for Outdoor - Color EVA Film - Constructional Sector - Electronic Sector + Decorative Fabric for Glass Laminated + Other Accessories - Installation Tools - Processing Tools - Accessories For Glass Lamination - EVA Laminating Machine Application + Healthcare + Home + Hotels + Offices + Store Contact Us Blog + News + Knowledge VR [...] HUICHI, one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers in China, now brings customers quality smart glass made in China. As one of the famous brands, our factory also offers customers the free sample, the price list and quotation consultation, as well as the customized service of smart glass. [...] Better energy-saving effect The glass can automatically control the light transmittance according to the indoor temperature and sunshine, reducing the electricity cost of indoor air conditioning. 02 More flexibility The smart glass can be customized according to individual or company needs, providing more design space and flexibility. 03 Better environmental protection

items.title: [PDF] MADE IN CHINA 2025
items.content: Technology suppliers for smart manufacturing. Tech suppliers produce, integrate and sell technologies needed for automation and digitisation such as robots, industrial software and Radio Frequency Identiication (RFID) chips. Industrial policy will help to build a small number of highly advanced Chinese national champions that are able to supply state-of-the art technology. The tech suppliers will be increasingly capable of competing with leading foreign tech suppliers domestically and globally. [...] Industrial policy will help to create or further elevate a small vanguard of Chinese manufacturers that will achieve a highly advanced level of eiciency and productivity through smart manufacturing within the next decade. These frontrun-ner manufacturers will successfully utilise modern production methods to considerably improve their competitiveness in domestic and international markets. [...] MANUFACTURERS USING SMART MANUFACTURING Avoid illusions about the technology gap. Complacency is a major risk for advanced indus-tries. Currently, European and American companies are still well advanced in the use of smart manufacturing in comparison to most of their Chinese competitors. But some Chinese compa-nies will catch up quickly. To avoid being caught on the wrong foot, European and United States companies need to maintain their focus on their own technological advancement. Coordinate

items.title: Gauzy's State-of-The-Art Smart Glass Technologies Utilized in the ...
items.content: This use of Gauzyâ€™s combined SPD and PDLC technologies highlights the strong demand and accelerating adoption of Gauzyâ€™s products by leading OEMs. The Company continues to expand its footprint in the fast-growing automotive smart glass market, projected to reach a total addressable market (TAM) of $25 billion by 2028. Mercedes-Benz officially unveiled the Vision V at the Mercedes-Benz Brand Day on April 22 and displays the show car at Auto Shanghai 2025. [...] The world premiere of the Vision V was on April 22 at the Mercedes-Benz Brand Day in Shanghai. As of today, the Vision V will be displayed at the Auto Shanghai 2025 Show (April 23â€“May 2, Booth 4A10). [...] Terms Privacy Your Privacy Choices CA Privacy Notice Feedback Â© 2025 All rights reserved. Contact the press release distributor directly with any inquiries. # Gauzyâ€™s State-of-The-Art Smart Glass Technologies Utilized in the Mercedes-Benz Vision V Show Car, Unveiled at Auto Shanghai 2025 GAUZY LTD 8 min read In this article: GAUZ +14.90% REFR -1.05%

items.title: SMART GLASS TECHNOLOGIES
items.content: At Smart Glass Technologies, our vision is to establish ourselves as the premier supplier and industry expert in switchable privacy glass solutions. We strive to consistently exceed customer expectations by offering exceptional customer service and a comprehensive one-stop-shop experience that includes manufacturing, installation, and ongoing support. Through our unwavering commitment to innovation and continuous investments in switchable glass technology, we aim to meet the most demanding [...] # Team Smart Glass Technologies, a leading name in the switchable smart glass and smart film industry, boasts over 15 certified installation teams spread across the USA and Canada. We stand out as the only company in our sector to have our own dedicated installation teams situated in major North American cities. Our primary focus is our commitment to delivering the highest quality products, coupled with impeccable installation services, guaranteeing our clientsâ€™ satisfaction. [...] At Smart Glass Technologies, our mission is to help developers, architects, interior designers, and homeowners to use switchable smart glass for their real estate projects. We are ready to respond to the ambition and imagination of our customers. To achieve that, we manufacture high-quality products and provide full technical assistance. â€¢ We implement projects of any scale or complexity by taking control and easily tailoring the process to your unique requirements.

items.title: Research Frontiers Licenses Tint-It To Offer SPD-SmartGlass ...
items.content: in residential and commercial construction. We see substantial sales potential in our region and look forward to continuing the expansion of our SPD-SmartGlass business as a direct licensee of Research Frontiers.â€ [...] â€œSPD-SmartGlass offers a complete and unequaled combination of shading, privacy and energy management to our customers. Our network of 30 authorized dealers throughout Russia, Kazakhstan, and the Ukraine already has had a positive experience selling SPD-SmartGlass for the automotive market since 2011, and we are currently expanding this network to cover other areas of our region,â€ noted Vladislav Kravchenko, Development Director for Tint-It. â€œIn addition to geographic expansion, we are also [...] now expanding our product line to include SPD-SmartGlass for the architectural market. Because of the success and growing sales here, as we expand our business, it made sense to evolve from being a distributor of SPD-SmartGlass, to manufacturing it directly under license from Research Frontiers. In addition to our experience marketing, selling and installing SPD-SmartGlass, our affiliated group of companies has glass manufacturing experience with PDLC glass, as well as business units involved

items.title: Smartglass International: Switchable Glass
items.content: In any architectural design there will be a balance between design elements, working with natural light, open space, and privacy requirements to create an attractive, yet functional space. With its ability to transition instantly from transparent to opaque, smart glass technology brings new solutions to this age-old challenge. For those â€¦ Continue reading View All Insights ### Download Smartglass Brochure [...] Discover the possibilities of switchable smart glass to create multi-functional spaces that adapt to usersâ€™ needs at the flick of a switch. Download Brochure ### Download Smartglass Brochure Discover the possibilities of switchable smart glass to create multi-functional spaces that adapt to users' needs at the flick of a switch Learn more about our data protection and privacy policies. #### Contact ## Get in Touch [...] Privacy Smart Glass enhances boardroom privacy with instant opacity, ensuring confidentiality during sensitive meetings. View Project### Hospital Surgery Theatre, Portugal, EU Hygienic Blackout Smart Glass delivers multi-state privacy in a challenging healthcare setting. items.title: Taiwan's New Smart Technology lands major US AR glasses order
items.content: A fresh wave of augmented reality (AR) smart glasses is beginning to ripple through the consumer electronics market, promising to leap far beyond current AI-enabled eyewear in both sophistication and scale. This shift is not only setting the stage for... The article requires paid subscription. Now MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS [...] ASUS IoT AISEHS raises intelligent security standards, helping semiconductor industry move from passive to active protection MOST-READ 7 DAYS NEWS [...] DeepSeek to drive 107% annual growth in China smart glasses marketAR glasses market heats up ahead of major launches in 2025Meta prototype AR glasses features chip co-developed with MediaTek Show more Categories Display components Displays + photonics Display system ICT manufacturing Tags AR electronics market smart glasses Taiwan Share this article Related topics Global supply chain: Advanced economies Global supply chain: China market VR/AR BIZ FOCUS Nov 26, 08:00

items.title: Developing AI+AR, AI+MR and other multi-form eyewear products
items.content: PANews reported on July 22 that the Shanghai Municipal Economic and Information Commission issued the "Shanghai Next Generation Display Industry High-Quality Development Action Plan (2026-2030)". It pointed out that smart glasses will drive display technology innovation. Actively deploy smart glasses production capacity and build intelligent and unmanned production lines. items.title: Developing multi form eyewear products such as AI+AR and AI+MR
items.content: The Shanghai Municipal Commission of Economy and Information Technology has issued the Action Plan for High Quality Development of the Next Generation Display Industry in Shanghai (2026-2030). It is pointed out that smart glasses will drive innovation in display technology. Actively layout the production capacity of smart glasses and build intelligent and unmanned production lines. Develop multi form eyewear products such as AI+AR and AI+MR, and cultivate a multi technology micro display [...] and accelerate the development of full-color, portable smart glasses products. items.title: Shanghai: Support the leap of smart glasses capabilities and ... - Taibo
items.content: On October 13th, the Shanghai Municipal Commission of Economy and Information Technology issued the "Action Plan for High Quality Development of Shanghai's Intelligent Terminal Industry (2026-2027)". Among them, it is proposed to support the leap of smart glasses capability. Accelerate the development of a number of smart eyewear head brands around the three forms of AR, MR, and VR eyewear products, forming a complete product matrix covering consumer, enterprise, and professional levels. [...] # Shanghai: Support the leap of smart glasses capabilities and improve the ecosystem of smart glasses developers 14 Oct 2025 18:47 [...] other fields.

items.title: China Automotive Smart Glass Research Report 2024, Featuring ...
items.content: In this ecosystem, suppliers leverage their excellent manufacturing capabilities and professional technologies to produce high-performance smart glass products; OEMs vigorously join in the research and development process, gain insights into changes in market demand, and meet users' growing demand for personalization and customization, further broadening the application scope of automotive smart glass. Case 1: Fuyao's panoramic canopies feature starry domes and projection functions [...] Fuyao Glass AGC NSG Saint-Gobain Xinyi Glass Shanghai Yaohua Pilkington Glass (SYP Glass) Ambilight J1 AI Glass BOE Key Topics Covered: 1 Overview of Automotive Smart Glass 1.1 Classification of Automotive Glass Functions 1.2 Overview of Automotive Smart Dimming Glass 1.3 Integration Location of Automotive Smart Glass 1.4 Automotive Smart Dimming Glass: Technology Route and Market Size 1.4.1 Automotive Smart Dimming Glass: Technology Route [...] and...

items.title: What Makes Smart Glass the Future of Innovative Interiors?
items.content: Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal (PDLC) technology represents another major advancement in smart glass applications, offering instant switching capabilities between transparent and translucent states. Commercial spaces benefit tremendously from smart glass installations, particularly in conference rooms and executive offices where privacy requirements fluctuate throughout business operations. The extended lifespan of smart glass installations, typically exceeding 20-30 years with minimal maintenance requirements, provides excellent long-term environmental benefits compared to traditional window treatments and glazing systems. Modern smart glass installations seamlessly integrate with comprehensive home automation platforms, enabling coordinated control alongside lighting, security, and climate management systems. Successful smart glass installations require careful planning of electrical infrastructure to support power delivery and control signal distribution. Smart glass installations typically provide 20-30 years of reliable service with minimal maintenance requirements.

items.title: Smart Glass in Shanghai, China - Gauzy
items.content: # Smart Glass in Shanghai, China Gauzy is a world leader in the development and manufacturing of smart glass technology, the go-to choice for architects and interior designers in Shanghai. ## Smart Glass Projects Near Shanghai, China ## Smart Glass by Industry PDLC technology is available as as a laminated smart glass or adhesive smart film. * Gauzyâ€™s LCGÂ® smart glass technology is available in over 40 countries What is smart glass and how is it used in Shanghai, China? Is Gauzy's smart glass UL listed? Yes, Gauzyâ€™s smart glass is UL listed. Does Gauzy install smart glass in Shanghai, China? No. We work with a network of professional installers who handle smart glass and film installation in Shanghai, China

items.title: Gauzy Named Exclusive Smart Glass Provider for Top 3 US Bank
items.content: NEW YORK, Aug. 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gauzy Ltd. (Nasdaq: GAUZ) (â€œGauzyâ€ or the â€œCompanyâ€), a global leader in vision and light control technologies, today announced it has been selected as the exclusive smart glass supplier for a Fortune 100 financial services leader. Passing rigorous testing, Gauzy was selected for its product reliability and exceptional customer service. This milestone validates Gauzyâ€™s differentiated technology and supports the Companyâ€™s strategy to scale deployments [...] Gauzyâ€™s smart glass has already been installed in multiple office locations across the United States, including Texas, Florida, and Pennsylvania, among other financial hubs. The project is expected to expand over time as new facilities are built, and existing sites are modernized. [...] These forward-looking statements reflect Gauzyâ€™s current views with respect to future events and are based on assumptions and information currently available to the company. Actual results may differ materially from those projected due to a number of risks and uncertainties, including, but not limited to, those related to market conditions, customer demand, product performance, economic conditions, competition, and other factors beyond the companyâ€™s control.

The multi-phase rollout plan indicates significant future growth potential and recurring demand for Gauzy's products and services. This partnership highlights Gauzy's reliable products and customer service, aligning with the clientâ€™s goals for office modernization, sustainability, and improved customer experience. The project is set to expand as more facilities are constructed and existing ones updated,

items.title: Gauzy Unveils Revolutionary Black Smart Glass ...
items.content: NEW YORK and TEL AVIV, Israel, Jan. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gauzy Ltd. (Nasdaq: GAUZ), a global leader in light and vision control technology, is pleased to announce that it has unveiled its latest suspended particle device (SPD) Smart Glass technology at CES 2025, the most influential tech event in the world. Gauzyâ€™s first-ever black SPD Smart Glass technology has a distinguishable black appearance and was created to accommodate the robust demand from the three strong and growing markets [...] Moreover, additional light and vision control products of Gauzyâ€™s that increase safety, comfort and sustainability are on display in the companyâ€™s booth, including smart glass sunroofs, side door windows and sun visors with either SPD or PDLC technology, its AI-powered advanced driver assistance system (ADAS) Smart-VisionÂ® for buses and trucks; a 55" LG Display T-OLED with segmented SPD and smart glass and shading solutions for commercial and private aircraft as well as railway. [...] This latest innovation positions Gauzy to further solidify its already dominant market share within the smart glass industry. The popularity of SPD Smart Glass â€“ as well as polymer dispersed liquid crystal (PDLC) Smart Glass, which the company also develops and manufactures â€“ continues to rise due to its numerous advantages over traditional shading systems and other smart glass solutions, including its ability to transition from clear to fully opaque within seconds, block more than 99% of

items.title: Gauzy Announces First-Ever Prefabricated Smart Glass Stack for ...
items.content: NEW YORK, July 01, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Gauzy Ltd. (NASDAQ: GAUZ), a global leader in light and vision control technologies, today unveiled a turnkey solution designed to maximize manufacturing efficiency and accelerate smart glass adoption in the automotive sector: the first prefabricated smart glass stack. This fully industrialized product aims to support scalable integration across vehicle platforms while delivering strong value for investors. The ready-to-laminate smart glass stack [...] Reco. items.title: Xiaomi Just Changed AI Smart Glasses FOREVER (genius ...
items.content: # Xiaomi Just Changed AI Smart Glasses FOREVER (genius move) ## Gadget Evolution 19200 rs 5805 likes ### Description 433280 views Posted: 31 Jul 2025 Xiaomi just dropped AI smartglasses that completely redefine what smart glasses can do - and at a price that makes every other wearable tech company look ridiculous. Weâ€™re uncovering the good, the bad and the ugly of Xiaomi AI Glasses and see if this really is the future of wearables happening right now. [...] Introduction: Xiaomi's Smart Glasses Revolution Xiaomi just pulled off what might be the smartest move in tech history. And if you're thinking of buying smart glasses in 2025, you absolutely need to hear this. While everyone's been obsessing over Ray-B band Metas and throwing money at overpriced alternatives, Xiaomi quietly dropped a bomb that's got me scratching my head in the best way possible. We're talking about glasses that cost less than half of what Meta charges, yet somehow managed to [...] ever worn heavy glasses for extended periods, you know that pressure point pain. Xiaomi engineered this away, making these genuinely comfortable for all day use. The audio Audio Quality system is where Xiaomi shows they understand realworld usage. The Open Ear speakers use what appears to be bone conduction technology, delivering clear sound without blocking ambient noise. You can listen to music, take calls, or interact with AI while still hearing traffic, conversations, and your environment.

items.title: Global Smart Glass Market to grow to $5.8 Billion USD by 2020
items.content: SPD glass can provide approximately 50% saving on consumption of energy. The customization and superior working reduces the load of HVAC systems (heating, ventilating, air-condition) of the building. The growth of SPD smart glass is mainly driven by the increase in the demand for energy-efficient and eco-friendly products. Transportation market segment expected to dominate the smart glass market during the forecast period: [...] When installed in the envelope of buildings, smart glass creates climate adaptive building shells, with the ability to save costs for heating, air-conditioning and lighting and avoid the cost of installing and maintaining motorized light screens or blinds or curtains. Most smart glass blocks ultraviolet light, reducing fabric fading; for SPD-type smart glass, this is achieved in conjunction with low emissivity coatings. [...] Smart glass or switchable glass (also smart windows or switchable windows in those applications) is glass or glazing whose light transmission properties are altered when voltage, light or heat is applied. Generally, the glass changes from translucent to transparent, changing from blocking some (or all) wavelengths of light to letting light pass through. MSE Supplies is a leading supplier of high quality materials and equipment for advanced materials research and manufacturing.

items.title: DeepSeek's AI models give boost to China's smart glasses sector to ...
items.content: DeepSeek is reshaping the industry, according to Zhu. Combined with Chinaâ€™s advantages in hardware supply chain and optics, DeepSeekâ€™s AI models offer a more flexible solution for the smart glasses sector, which can help expand the adoption of these products, he said. Advertisement [...] DeepSeekâ€™s open-source artificial intelligence (AI) models are injecting fresh momentum into Chinese makers of smart glasses, as the technology enables developers to integrate more advanced capabilities into their products at a lower cost. â€œDeepSeekâ€™s low-cost, high-price-performance model has fundamentally reshaped the economics of AI deployment,â€ said Misa Zhu Mingming, founder and chief executive of Hangzhou-based Rokid, a start-up that makes AI-equipped augmented-reality (AR) glasses.

items.title: DNP improves chip packages with glass-cored substrate ...
items.content: # DNP improves chip packages with glass-cored substrate Technology News | By Peter Clarke Analog Materials & processes ## Dai Nippon Printing Co. Ltd. has developed a glass-based substrate that is claims is an improvement on resin-based substrates such as flip-chip ball-grid-array (FC-BGA). [...] The GCS supports TGV aspect rations of more than 9:1. As there are few restrictions regarding the thickness of the glass substrate used, it is possible to boost the degree of freedom when designing for warpage, rigidity, and flatness. DNP said it is promoting the use of a panel size of 510mm by 515mm and is aiming for sales of 5 billion yen (about US$38 million) in the 2027 financial year. #### Related links and articles: www.global.dnp #### News articles: [...] The company has developed a technique called through-glass-via (TGV) to provide a higher performance package based on glass. DNP said that by adapting its display panel manufacturing process, its Glass-Core Substrate (GCS) is able to provide larger substrates. X-ray image of TGV in the glass core substrate. Source: DNP.

items.title: DNP Glass Substrate: Precision for High-Tech Evolution
items.content: ### 5G and Internet of Things (IoT) Applications The rollout of 5G networks and the expansion of the Internet of Things (IoT) represent significant opportunities for DNP glass substrates. These applications require substrates that can handle high frequencies, enhanced data processing, and reliable connectivity: [...] Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd. (DNP) has established itself as a global leader in the field of high-performance materials, including glass substrates. The companyâ€™s extensive reach and influence span across various continents, with dedicated facilities and partnerships ensuring a robust market presence in key regions. DNPâ€™s strategic expansions and investments underscore its commitment to maintaining leadership in innovation and quality within the electronics and materials science industries. [...] In summary, DNP glass substrates are indispensable across multiple high-tech fields, thanks to their superior properties and performance. From enhancing the capabilities of CPUs and GPUs to supporting the latest advancements in display technologies and sensors, these substrates are at the forefront of innovation in the electronics and semiconductor industries. Their versatility and reliability make them a critical component in the ongoing development of advanced electronic and optical devices.

items.title: Wicue
items.content: Wicue is a pioneer in flexible liquid crystal (LC) film reasearch and its applications, with ground-breaking technologies of Crystal Clear Switching (Wicue CCS) and High-brightness Liquid Crystal Writing. These cutting-edge technologies are utilized in an array of advanced products. Our mission at Wicue is to develop intelligent optical solutions for everyday life and revolutionize the integration of optical technology into the future. [...] Contact Us Welcome to Wicue Don't have an account yet? Forgot password? Send Create Account Already a member?Log In Store Visit Store Tuning ideal light Wicue dimmable products will become an integral part of our future lifestyle Watch the Video Perfect comfort with perfect dynamic shading Magical light control for panoramic sunroof, car window and rear mirror Save energy! items.title: Smart/Switchable Glass Market Trends & Forecast 2025
items.content: ##### Home Report Store Industries Press Releases Blogs About Us Contact Us # Smart/Switchable Glass Market Size to Reach USD 18.47 Billion by 2032 growing at 12.8% CAGR - Exclusive Report by Acumen Research and Consulting Published : 11 Mar 2025 Share : ## Smart Switchable Glass market, valued at USD 6.34 Billion in 2023, is projected to surpass USD 18.47 Billion by 2032, indicating a robust CAGR of 12.8% [...] The Asia-Pacific region is witnessing rapid growth in the smart glass market, driven by increasing construction activities and urbanization. Countries like China, Japan, and South Korea are seeing a rise in demand for energy-efficient, smart glass solutions in both residential and commercial buildings. The growing automotive industry and government support for sustainable technologies further fuel market expansion. Additionally, increasing consumer awareness and interest in eco-friendly [...] ## Smart/Switchable Glass Market Players Smart/switchable glass companies profiled in the report include View, Inc, Saint-Gobain, Schott AG, GENTEX Corporation, Asahi India Glass Ltd., Scienstry, Inc., AGC Inc., SPD Control Systems Corporation, Essex Safety Glass, Polytronix, Inc., BSG Glass, and Central Glass Co., Ltd. [...] Electrochromic solutions dominated 2024 with 43.00% smart glass market share. Their low-power operation, gradual tinting, and proven 50,000 cycle life make them the default choice for large facades and corporate campuses. The smart glass market size for electrochromic products is projected to expand from USD 4.80 billion in 2025 to USD 7.70 billion by 2030 at a 9.8% CAGR. Cost-out roadmaps ranging from in-line sputtering to all-solid-state chemistries keep capex budgets predictable. items.title: Smart Glasses Market Growth Analysis - Size and Forecast 2025-2029
items.content: According to recent studies, The market is projected to grow by approximately 15% in the next year. Furthermore, the market is expected to reach a value of around 25 billion USD by 2027, representing a growth of roughly 20% over the next five years. These projections underscore the significant potential for growth in the market. A comparison of market shares reveals that North America currently holds the largest market share, accounting for approximately 45% of the global market. Europe follows [...] These figures highlight the competitive landscape of the market and the significant role each region plays in its growth. In conclusion, the market is experiencing robust growth, with North America leading the way due to its history of technology adoption and the presence of major OEMs. Europe and the Asia Pacific region are also witnessing substantial growth, driven by factors such as increasing awareness of health and wellness and rapid technological advancements. The market is projected to [...] emerging trends, offering enhanced functionality and user convenience. The market is expected to grow substantially, with industry expectations pointing to a 30.7% increase in demand. The continuous evolution of this market is fueled by ongoing advancements in technology and the increasing adoption across various sectors, including healthcare, manufacturing, and education.

items.title: Pdlc Switchable Film Market Research: In-Depth Study 2035
items.content: ## PDLC Switchable Film Market Overview: PDLC Switchable Film Market Overview: The PDLC Switchable Film Market Size was valued at 377 USD Million in 2024. The PDLC Switchable Film Market is expected to grow from 447.5 USD Million in 2025 to 2,500 USD Million by 2035. The PDLC Switchable Film Market CAGR (growth rate) is expected to be around 18.7% during the forecast period (2025 - 2035). Key PDLC Switchable Film Market Trends Highlighted [...] The automotive industry is undergoing significant transformation with a growing emphasis on innovative technologies. PDLC switchable films are becoming increasingly popular in vehicles, providing privacy and UV protection while enhancing aesthetics. items.title: PDLC Smart Film Market Size, Share and Forecast
items.content: Growth in Automotive and Transportation Sectors: The automotive industry is incorporating smart films in vehicles for enhanced comfort and aesthetics, providing another avenue for market expansion. Demand for Smart Homes: The trend towards home automation and smart home solutions is driving the adoption of PDLC smart films in windows and partitions, making homes more versatile and comfortable. [...] | Global industry landscape and trends Market momentum and key issues Technology landscape Marketâ€™s emerging opportunities Porterâ€™s analysis and PESTEL analysis Competitive landscape and component benchmarking Policy and regulatory scenario | Market revenue estimates and forecast up to 2027 Market revenue estimates and forecasts up to 2027, by technology Market revenue estimates and forecasts up to 2027, by application Market revenue estimates and forecasts up to 2027, by type [...] Growing Demand for Energy Efficiency: With increasing focus on energy conservation, PDLC films are used in smart windows and facades to control light and heat, enhancing energy efficiency in buildings. Advancements in Technology: Continuous improvements in the technology behind PDLC films, such as better performance, durability, and cost-effectiveness, are likely to drive market growth.

items.title: Spd Smart Glass Market Research: In-Depth Study 2035
items.content: ## SPD Smart Glass Market Overview: SPD Smart Glass Market Overview: The SPD Smart Glass Market Size was valued at 1,043.3 USD Million in 2024. The SPD Smart Glass Market is expected to grow from 1,165.4 USD Million in 2025 to 3,500 USD Million by 2035. The SPD Smart Glass Market CAGR (growth rate) is expected to be around 11.7% during the forecast period (2025 - 2035). Key SPD Smart Glass Market Trends Highlighted [...] â€¢ Asia: The Asia Pacific SPD smart glass market sees rapid growth from sectors like automotive and healthcare. Government initiatives such as Smart Cities Mission in India drive urban development. The regional market is expected to grow robustly, with projected investments in smart technologies surpassing USD 25 billion by 2025. SPD Smart Glass Market Application Insights [...] â€¢ View, Inc. announced in March 2025 a strategic partnership with Saint-Gobain to accelerate deployment of SPD smart glass in global commercial buildings, combining View's switchable film technology with Saint-Gobain's architectural glass expertise. â€¢ Asahi Glass announced in January 2025 the acquisition of MSD GmbH to broaden SPD glass manufacturing capabilities and expand its product portfolio for architectural and automotive markets.

items.content: The smart glasses market is experiencing explosive growth. According to Tech in Asia, Global smart glasses shipments surged by around 110% in the first half of 2025. This surge reflects growing consumer and enterprise interest in wearable tech that enhances productivity, entertainment, and connectivity. According to the report by Next Move Strategy Consulting, the global Smart Glass Market size is expected to reach USD 11.74 billion by 2030, with a CAGR of 10% from 2024 to 2030. [...] The smart glasses market is poised for further growth. With shipments surging by about 110% in 2025 and new devices like Project Aura entering the fray, the technology is becoming more accessible and versatile. ## Future Trends Improved Optics: Advances in optical see-through technology will enhance clarity and immersion. Wider Applications: From gaming to remote work, smart glasses will expand into new use cases. Affordability: As production scales, prices may drop, boosting adoption. [...] Shipments of smart glasses globally increased by about 110% year-on-year in H1 2025. The smart glasses market is thriving due to technological innovation and diverse applications.
